Through intense firefights and covert operations, these modern warriors discover that the greatest threat to world peace comes from those who claim to protect it.

Name: Thymesia
Description:
In a kingdom ravaged by a mysterious alchemical plague, the enigmatic Corvus awakens with fragmented memories and the power to steal abilities from his enemies.
As this plague doctor explores the decaying Hermes Kingdom, he encounters grotesque mutated creatures and discovers that the line between cure and poison has been tragically blurred.
Through brutal combat and painful revelations, Corvus must piece together his lost memories to uncover the truth about the forbidden experiments that doomed his people and find a way to end the eternal suffering.

Name: Pokémon White Version 2
Description:
Two years after the events with Team Plasma, a new trainer begins their journey through a transformed Unova region where old conflicts still echo in the changing landscape.
The mysterious Kyurem has merged with Reshiram, creating the powerful White Kyurem, as the reformed Team Plasma under Colress seeks to control this legendary fusion.
Through encounters with new Pokémon species and exploration of previously inaccessible areas, the young trainer must help N and the Gym Leaders restore balance to their beloved region.

Name: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4
Description:
Young Harry Potter discovers his magical heritage and enters the enchanted Hogwarts School, where ancient corridors hide countless secrets and mystical artifacts.
Alongside loyal friends Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley, Harry faces the growing threat of the dark wizard Lord Voldemort who seeks to destroy everything the young wizard holds dear.
Through magical lessons, dangerous adventures, and encounters with fantastic creatures, Harry learns that the power of friendship and courage can overcome even the darkest evil magic.

Name: Fire Emblem Fates
Description: Prince Corrin discovers their true heritage between warring kingdoms Nohr and Hoshido. With loyal retainers Felicia and Jakob, plus dragon siblings, they navigate treacherous politics and deadly magic. As ancient dragons return and dark forces manipulate both sides, Corrin's choices determine whether light or darkness claims the world.

Name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr
Description: Inquisitor Martyr awakens aboard fortress-monastery drifting through the Caligari Sector as a tomb of secrets. This elite agent of the God-Emperor must purge Chaos corruption and alien horrors from ancient halls. Armed with blessed weapons and unwavering faith, the Inquisitor faces a conspiracy threatening to unleash damnation upon the galaxy.

Name: One Piece: World Seeker
Description: Infamous Monkey D. Luffy and his Straw Hat Pirates arrive at mysterious Prison Island where corrupt World Government conducts sinister experiments. When separated from his crew and framed, Luffy navigates political intrigue searching for missing nakama. Through rubber-powered battles and rebel alliances, the future Pirate King uncovers conspiracy threatening freedom and adventure.

Name: No Man's Sky
Description: A lone space explorer awakens on alien world with damaged starship and mysterious Atlas device. Across infinite procedurally generated universe, they gather resources, upgrade technology, and uncover truth behind ancient Sentinels guarding planetary secrets. Through encounters with bizarre alien species, underwater exploration, and planetary base construction, the traveler follows a path toward the galaxy's center where the ultimate mystery of the simulation awaits.

Name: Saw II: Flesh & Blood
Description: Detective Michael Tapp finds himself trapped in Jigsaw's twisted games where survival depends on impossible moral choices. Within claustrophobic abandoned psychiatric hospital, Michael navigates deadly mechanical traps while confronting past sins. As the puppet master's voice echoes through blood-stained corridors, Michael discovers the true test isn't surviving gruesome puzzles, but determining who deserves life and who pays for moral failures.

Name: Fallout Shelter
Description: As Overseer of underground Vault-Tec shelter, you guide survivors through post-nuclear life in the American wasteland. Managing precious food, water, and power, you assign vault dwellers to jobs while protecting from raider attacks. Through planning and expansion, your sanctuary grows into thriving subterranean civilization where humanity rebuilds after the Great War.

Name: Rise of the Ronin
Description: In twilight Edo period, masterless ronin samurai navigates political upheaval as Western influence transforms feudal Japan. Torn between traditional samurai values and modernization's promise, the ronin chooses sides in Japan's destiny-determining conflict. Through intense sword combat, stealth missions, and moral choices, this wandering warrior discovers true honor lies in protecting innocents caught between old ways and the new world.

Name: Breath of Fire: Dragon Quarter
Description: Beneath poisoned surface world, young Ryu lives in oppressive underground city where cruel D-Counter system ranks citizens' worth. When Ryu awakens ancient dragon power within, he journeys surface-ward with mysterious Nina and skilled Lin. Racing against time as his Dragon Counter counts toward doom, Ryu masters terrifying abilities while fighting through a world where hope has been systematically destroyed.

Name: Katamari Damacy REROLL
Description: Diminutive Prince helps eccentric father, the King of All Cosmos, restore stars after his drunken rampage destroyed them. Armed with magical katamari ball that grows by rolling objects, the Prince travels surreal environments collecting thumbtacks to buildings. Through absurd rolling adventures across Japanese neighborhoods, bustling cities, and the entire world, this whimsical tale celebrates creation through delightful chaos.

Name: Syphon Filter 2
Description:
Agent Gabe Logan and partner Lian Xing are branded terrorists after exposing the deadly Syphon Filter virus conspiracy that threatens global annihilation.
Pursued by corrupt Agency operatives and hunted across international borders, they fight to survive while uncovering the truth behind a plot that reaches the highest levels of government.
Through explosive firefights, stealth infiltrations, and high-tech espionage missions, Gabe discovers that the greatest enemy isn't the bioweapon itself—it's the shadow organization manipulating world events from behind the scenes, where trust becomes the deadliest weapon of all.

Name: Spider-Man: Web of Shadows
Description:
When Venom's symbiote spreads like a plague across New York City, Spider-Man must choose between his heroic nature and the dark power of the black suit.
As the city falls under an alien invasion, Spider-Man forms unlikely alliances with both heroes and villains, including Black Cat and the conflicted Black Widow.
Through intense web-slinging combat and moral choices that affect the story's outcome, Peter Parker faces his greatest internal battle as the symbiote's influence threatens to consume his soul and turn him into the very monster he's sworn to protect the city from.

Name: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage
Description:
In the nostalgic summer of 1995, four teenage friends form the band Bloom & Rage in their small hometown, dreaming of musical stardom and eternal friendship.
When a mysterious incident tears the group apart, they make a pact to never speak of what happened, burying their dark secret along with their dreams.
Twenty-seven years later, the surviving members are forced to reunite when their past catches up with them, revealing that some buried truths have a way of clawing back to the surface, threatening to destroy the new lives they've built on a foundation of lies and regret.

Name: Resistance 3
Description:
Four years after the devastating Chimera invasion, former soldier Joseph Capelli lives in hiding with his family in the ruins of a world where humanity teeters on the brink of extinction.
When the alien terraforming towers begin freezing Earth into an inhospitable wasteland, Capelli must abandon his peaceful life to join a desperate mission across the post-apocalyptic American landscape.
Armed with scavenged human and Chimera weapons, he faces horrific mutated creatures and the final Chimera stronghold in New York City, knowing that failure means the end of the human race.

Name: Hitman: Codename 47
Description:
The genetically engineered assassin known only as Agent 47 awakens in a Romanian asylum with no memories of his past, only an instinctive mastery of death and a barcode tattooed on the back of his bald head.
Recruited by the mysterious International Contract Agency, he embarks on a series of assassination missions that take him from the luxury hotels of Hong Kong to the Colombian jungles.
Through meticulous planning and cold precision, 47 discovers that his targets are connected to his own dark origins, forcing him to confront the scientists who created him and the truth about his existence as the perfect killing machine.

Name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner 2 - Raidou Kuzunoha vs King Abaddon
Description:
In 1931 Taisho-era Japan, the 14th generation Raidou Kuzunoha serves as a supernatural detective protecting the capital from otherworldly threats alongside his loyal demon companions.
When mysterious red cape figures begin abducting citizens and a powerful entity known as King Abaddon threatens to plunge the world into chaos, Raidou must uncover a conspiracy that reaches the highest levels of society.
Through demon negotiation, sword combat, and investigation across 1930s Tokyo, this trench coat-wearing summoner discovers that preventing the apocalypse requires confronting not just supernatural enemies, but the human ambitions that seek to reshape Japan's destiny.

Name: Dragon's Dogma II
Description:
When an ancient dragon tears your heart from your chest, you awaken as the Arisen, a chosen warrior destined to hunt the beast across the vast fantasy realm of Vermund.
Accompanied by your loyal Pawn companions - mystical beings who serve without question - you embark on an epic quest through treacherous dungeons, ancient ruins, and monster-infested wilderness.
As political intrigue unfolds between the human kingdom and the beastren nation, your pursuit of the dragon becomes intertwined with a larger conflict, forcing you to master devastating magical vocations and confront the true nature of your cursed existence as you climb colossal monsters and reshape the fate of two worlds.

Name: Disgaea 5: Alliance of Vengeance
Description:
When the tyrannical Demon Emperor Void Dark conquers the Netherworld with his unstoppable Lost Army, the vengeful young overlord Killia forms an unlikely alliance with other demon lords.
Alongside the cheerful Seraphina, the curry-obsessed Usalia, and other eccentric allies, Killia must master the power of Overload Skills and lead massive tactical battles.
Through over-the-top combat where characters can deal millions of damage points, this alliance of vengeance discovers that defeating ultimate evil requires not just overwhelming power, but the strength found in unlikely friendships.

Name: Snatcher
Description:
In the cyberpunk future of Neo Kobe City, mysterious bio-roids called Snatchers infiltrate society by killing humans and assuming their identities with perfect synthetic skin.
Amnesiac Gillian Seed joins the elite J.U.N.K.E.R. task force to hunt these deadly androids, accompanied by his sarcastic robot navigator Metal Gear Mk-II.
Through point-and-click investigation and intense shooting sequences, Gillian uncovers a conspiracy that connects the Snatchers to his own forgotten past, revealing that the line between human and machine is far more blurred than he ever imagined in this noir-inspired thriller from Hideo Kojima.

Name: Beyond Good & Evil
Description:
On the alien world of Hillys, photojournalist Jade and her adoptive uncle Pey'j run an orphanage while the planet suffers under constant attacks from the hostile DomZ aliens.
When Jade discovers that the supposed protectors, the Alpha Sections military, are secretly collaborating with the invaders, she joins the underground resistance network IRIS.
Armed with her camera and staff, Jade investigates conspiracy and corruption while exploring diverse environments from underwater cities to space stations, proving that sometimes the greatest weapon against tyranny is simply the truth captured in a single photograph.

Name: Growlanser IV: Wayfarer of the Time
Description:
Young Crevanille serves as a knight in the kingdom of Dulkheim when mysterious angels begin appearing across the land, bringing with them an ominous prophecy of world destruction.
As the Screapers - powerful magical weapons - choose their wielders, Crevanille must navigate complex political alliances while forming deep bonds with companions like the noble Leona and the mysterious Eliza.
Through strategic real-time battles where positioning and timing determine victory, this tale of war and romance explores how personal relationships can either save the world or doom it, as Crevanille discovers that his choices in love and friendship will determine the fate of multiple timelines.

Name: Fullmetal Alchemist 2: Curse of the Crimson Elixir
Description:
Brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric investigate the mysterious Crimson Elixir when reports surface of a substance that can perform alchemy without following the fundamental law of equivalent exchange.
Accompanied by their childhood friend Winry Rockbell and military allies, the Elric brothers uncover a conspiracy involving ancient alchemical secrets and a mysterious organization.
Through intense alchemical combat where Edward transmutes the environment into weapons and Alphonse uses his armored strength, the brothers face moral dilemmas about the true cost of power while searching for a way to restore their original bodies without sacrificing their fundamental beliefs.

Name: Digimon World Dawn
Description:
Young Digimon tamers join the Light Fang organization to investigate mysterious incidents plaguing the Digital World as ancient conflicts resurface.
When the balance between Dawn and Dusk begins to crumble, tamers must forge bonds with powerful Digimon partners to prevent total chaos.
Through turn-based battles and Digimon training, these young heroes discover that the conflict between light and darkness runs deeper than they imagined, threatening to tear apart the very fabric of the digital realm they call home.

Name: Guns of Fury
Description: unknown story

Name: Super Mario Bros. 2
Description:
Mario, Luigi, Princess Peach, and Toad venture into the mystical land of Subcon to rescue it from the evil frog king Wart.
In this dream world, each hero possesses unique abilities - Mario's balanced skills, Luigi's high jumps, Peach's floating ability, and Toad's super strength - as they navigate bizarre landscapes filled with magical vegetables and strange creatures.
Through innovative gameplay that breaks from traditional Mario conventions, the heroes must master the art of picking up and throwing enemies while exploring a surreal realm where the laws of the Mushroom Kingdom no longer apply.

Name: Metal Slug XX
Description:
Elite soldiers Marco, Tarma, Fio, and Eri unite to combat the returning threat of General Morden's rebel army and their alien allies.
Armed with an arsenal of heavy weapons and piloting the legendary Metal Slug tanks, the heroes blast through enemy installations filled with mechanical monstrosities and extraterrestrial invaders.
Through relentless side-scrolling action where bullets fill the screen and explosions light up the battlefield, these brave warriors prove that no amount of enemy firepower can stop their mission to save the world from technological tyranny.

Name: Spilled!
Description: unknown story

Name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3: Night of the Quinkan
Description:
The heroic Ty the Tasmanian Tiger faces his greatest challenge when the malevolent Quinkan spirits invade his homeland, turning familiar territories into nightmare landscapes.
Armed with his iconic boomerangs and joined by his loyal friends Shazza and Dennis, Ty must navigate both traditional platforming levels and open-world vehicle exploration.
Through battles against shadow creatures and the discovery of ancient Dreamtime magic, this Aussie hero learns that protecting his family and friends requires mastering the delicate balance between the physical world and the spirit realm.

Name: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing
Description:
The fastest hedgehog in the world, Sonic, joins legendary Sega characters in high-speed kart racing across imaginative tracks inspired by classic game worlds.
Racing alongside Amy Rose, Tails, Dr. Eggman, and characters from Crazy Taxi, House of the Dead, and other beloved franchises, drivers use unique All-Star moves.
Through colorful courses filled with shortcuts, power-ups, and nostalgic references, this celebration of Sega's gaming legacy proves that when it comes to arcade racing fun, there's no substitute for pure speed.

Name: Anno Mutationem
Description:
In a neon-soaked cyberpunk future, the skilled warrior Ann Flores searches for her missing brother while uncovering a conspiracy involving mind-altering mutations and corporate corruption.
Switching between 2D side-scrolling combat and 3D exploration, Ann navigates the bustling Metropolis while wielding dual katanas and high-tech firearms against mutated creatures and shadowy organizations.
Through pixel art aesthetics and fluid combat mechanics, this cyberpunk tale explores themes of identity and family bonds in a world where the line between human and machine becomes increasingly blurred, threatening the very essence of what makes us truly alive.

Name: Needy Streamer Overload
Description:
As the manager of aspiring internet streamer OMGKawaiiAngel-chan, you must carefully balance her streaming career, mental health, and personal relationships in the volatile world of online fame.
Through daily choices about streaming content, medication, and social interactions, you guide this troubled young woman as she chases one million followers while battling depression, stress, and the dark side of internet culture.
In this provocative visual novel that explores modern digital society, every decision affects her follower count, mental state, and ultimate fate, revealing the disturbing reality behind the cheerful facade of social media stardom.

Name: Super Street Fighter II Turbo HD Remix
Description:
World warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li, Blanka, and M. Bison return with enhanced HD visuals and rebalanced gameplay in this definitive version of the classic fighting game.
Each fighter brings their signature special moves and Super Combos to international tournaments where martial arts masters compete for global supremacy.
Through precise inputs, frame-perfect timing, and strategic mind games, players discover that mastering the art of combat requires not just physical skill, but understanding the heart and soul of each unique fighting discipline.

Name: Summon Night X: Tears Crown
Description: Young summoner Cryna awakens ancient powers when the mystical Tears Crown chooses her as guardian. With loyal spirit companion Akugi and fellow summoner Folth, she battles the malevolent Nidhogg threatening to consume both human and spirit worlds. Through tactical battles and deepening bonds with summoned creatures, Cryna discovers that protecting the sacred balance requires both strength and sacrifice.

Name: Warhammer 40,000: Regicide
Description: In the grim darkness of the far future, elite Space Marines engage in strategic warfare combining classical chess with brutal combat. Blood Angels captain leads his squad against traitorous Chaos Marines in tactical battles where every move determines survival. Through turn-based strategy and real-time firefights, warriors prove that in the Emperor's name, victory demands both cunning strategy and righteous fury.

Name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
Description: Stalker Skif ventures into the deadly Chornobyl Exclusion Zone where reality bends and anomalies reshape the landscape. Armed with scavenged weapons, he navigates hostile territories controlled by rival factions while hunting valuable artifacts. As mutated creatures prowl the irradiated wasteland and the mysterious Heart calls to him, Skif discovers that survival depends on understanding the Zone's dark secrets.

Name: Devotion
Description: Father Du Feng He returns to his family's abandoned apartment in 1980s Taiwan, uncovering disturbing memories of his wife Li Fang and young daughter Mei Shin. Through shifting rooms haunted by religious obsession and family tragedy, he pieces together how his desperate faith in a false goddess destroyed everything he loved. As supernatural horrors manifest from guilt and denial, Du confronts the devastating truth about his family's fate.

Name: MindsEye
Description: Unknown story - mysterious mind-bending adventure where consciousness becomes the battlefield. Players navigate mental landscapes filled with fractured memories and psychological threats. Through perception-altering challenges and reality-bending puzzles, heroes must distinguish between truth and illusion while exploring the depths of human consciousness.

Name: Kirby’s Return to Dream Land Deluxe
Description: Pink hero Kirby helps alien visitor Magolor repair his crashed starship by collecting scattered Energy Spheres. With friends King Dedede, Meta Knight, and Waddle Dee, he explores diverse worlds while copying enemy abilities. When Magolor's true intentions are revealed and he seeks the Master Crown's power, Kirby must save Dream Land from dimensional collapse.

Name: Mario Kart: Double Dash!!
Description: Mario and Luigi team up in revolutionary two-driver karts for the ultimate racing championship. With Princess Peach, Wario, and other Mushroom Kingdom racers, they compete across imaginative tracks filled with power-ups and obstacles. Each character pair brings unique special items, from giant bananas to fireballs, creating chaotic races where teamwork determines victory in the Mushroom Kingdom.

Name: Need for Speed II
Description: Elite street racers compete in illegal underground tournaments featuring exotic supercars and dangerous courses. Driving high-performance vehicles like the McLaren F1 and Jaguar XJ220, racers navigate treacherous mountain roads and city circuits. With police pursuit adding danger and realistic physics challenging every turn, drivers must master both speed and control. Victory earns respect in the underground racing world where only the fastest legends survive.

Name: Mario Strikers Charged
Description: Mario leads his team in electrifying football matches where power-ups and special abilities transform traditional soccer. With Princess Peach, Luigi, and Donkey Kong, they compete in brutal matches featuring devastating Mega Strikes and lightning-charged stadiums. Each captain brings unique skills and special moves to intense tournaments where victory requires both strategy and raw power.

Name: Black Sigil: Blade of the Exiled
Description: Young Kairu discovers he's magicless in a world where everyone possesses magical abilities, marking him as the prophesied exile. With companions including warrior Ria and mage Aurora, he embarks on a quest to find the legendary Black Sigil and restore peace to the war-torn continent. Through classic turn-based battles and deep storytelling, Kairu learns that his lack of magic may be the key to defeating an ancient evil threatening all existence.

Name: Enderal: Forgotten Stories
Description: Unknown story - the Prophet awakens in strange land of Enderal with no memory of their past. With companion Calia and mentor Jespar, they discover this world faces apocalyptic threat from ancient force called the Cleansing. Through exploration of vast open world and powerful magic system, the Prophet must uncover the truth about their identity and prevent the end of all civilization.

Name: Life is Strange: True Colors
Description: Alex Chen moves to the mountain town of Haven Springs to reconnect with her brother Gabe, but discovers a tragic secret when he dies in a suspicious mining accident. Using her supernatural ability to see and absorb others' emotions as colored auras, she uncovers a corporate conspiracy involving the powerful Typhon Corporation. With friends Ryan and Steph, Alex must navigate painful memories and dangerous truths to find justice for her brother.

Name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless
Description: Demon overlord Fuji awakens to find the Netherworld transformed by the Bushido code, turning demons into honorable samurai warriors. With eccentric companions including hot-blooded Pirilika and mysterious Yeyasu, he battles against the oppressive Hinomoto Shogunate. Through tactical combat and comedic mishaps, Fuji discovers that even demons can embrace honor while fighting for freedom.

Name: Mario Party
Description: Mario and friends gather for the ultimate party competition on magical game boards where friendship turns to rivalry. With Princess Peach, Luigi, and Wario, they compete in mini-games and collect stars while Bowser creates chaos with his special events. Through dice rolls and strategic movement, players discover that victory requires both luck and cunning in this celebration of competitive fun.

Name: Paper Mario The Thousand-Year Door
Description: Paper hero Mario receives a letter from Princess Peach about a mysterious treasure map, leading him to the ancient town of Rogueport. With partner Goombella and the magical Thousand-Year Door, he searches for seven Crystal Stars while battling the sinister X-Nauts. Through turn-based combat and paper transformations, Mario discovers that some legends are better left forgotten when the ancient Shadow Queen threatens the world.

Name: Pokémon FireRed Version
Description: Young trainer Red begins his journey in Pallet Town with starter Charmander, Squirtle, or Bulbasaur to become the ultimate Pokemon champion. Battling rival Blue and collecting gym badges from leaders like Brock and Misty, he uncovers the criminal organization Team Rocket's plot to capture the legendary Mewtwo.

Name: Marvel's Avengers
Description: When Kamala Khan discovers the Avengers were framed for the devastating A-Day incident, she must reunite the disbanded heroes to face a new threat. Iron Man, Captain America, Hulk, Black Widow, and Thor must work together against the sinister AIM organization and their robotic army threatening humanity's future.

Name: Ar Tonelico Melody of Metafalica
Description: Knight Croix arrives at the floating continent Metafalss to investigate the failing I.P.D. that protects the land from deadly plasma storms. Meeting the mysterious Reyvateil singers Luca and Cloche, he discovers their magical songs hold the key to saving the world through the completion of the legendary Metafalica - a paradise song.

Name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution
Description: Young ninja Naruto Uzumaki trains alongside rivals Sasuke and teammate Sakura in the ultimate ninja tournament. Featuring legendary fighters like Madara Uchiha, Hashirama, and the powerful Akatsuki members, the tournament reveals hidden stories and epic battles that shaped the ninja world's destiny.

Name: The King of Fighters 2001
Description: Tournament fighter Kyo Kusanagi faces a new threat when the mysterious NESTS cartel organizes a deadly fighting tournament. With rivals Iori Yagami and teammates Benimaru and Daimon, he battles against enhanced fighters and deadly clones. Through intense combat using the innovative Striker System, warriors discover that this tournament hides a sinister plot threatening the world's balance.

Name: Super Smash Bros. Brawl
Description: Heroes from across Nintendo universes unite when the sinister Subspace Army threatens all worlds with annihilation. Mario, Link, Princess Peach, Samus, and Pikachu must overcome their differences to face the mysterious Tabuu. Through epic battles and unexpected alliances, these legendary fighters discover that their greatest strength lies in friendship and unity.

Name: Dynasty Warriors 9
Description: Warrior Zhao Yun fights through the chaotic Three Kingdoms period as ancient China tears itself apart in civil war. Alongside legendary heroes like Lu Bu, Diao Chan, and Cao Cao, he battles across vast open battlefields to unite the fractured realm. Through epic conflicts and personal relationships, these warriors discover that true victory requires both martial prowess and political wisdom in their quest for glory.

Name: Pocky & Rocky Reshrined
Description: Shrine maiden Pocky teams up with the mischievous tanuki Rocky when evil spirits threaten the peaceful countryside. Together they battle through haunted forests and ancient temples filled with yokai and supernatural creatures. Using sacred ofuda talismans and Rocky's magical leaf attacks, this unlikely partnership must restore balance to the spirit world and protect their homeland from dark forces.

Name: Five Nights at Freddy's 4
Description: A terrified child faces his worst nightmares when twisted versions of Freddy, Bonnie, Chica, and Foxy haunt his bedroom. Armed only with a flashlight and his wits, he must survive five nights of terror by listening for footsteps and breathing while the nightmare animatronics stalk him. This final chapter reveals the dark truth behind the Freddy Fazbear tragedy and the child's connection to the Bite of '83.

Name: Summon Night 2
Description: Young summoner Mag or Jill must forge weapons and summon powerful Guardian Beasts when an ancient evil threatens the world. With companions like the cheerful Aera and mysterious Toris, they explore dungeons and battle monsters while mastering the sacred art of weapon crafting. Through tactical combat and deepening friendships, this hero's journey reveals the true meaning of courage and sacrifice.

Name: The Legend of Zelda
Description: Hero Link awakens in the wilderness of Hyrule to rescue Princess Zelda from the evil sorcerer Ganon. Armed with sword and shield, he must explore dangerous dungeons and collect the eight fragments of the Triforce of Wisdom. Through treacherous labyrinths filled with monsters and puzzles, Link discovers ancient secrets and magical items that will help him face Ganon's dark power and restore peace to the kingdom.

Name: The Spirit and the Mouse
Description: Young Lila gains the magical ability to see and communicate with Kibblins - tiny electric spirits that power the charming French village of Sainte-et-Claire. When a massive power outage plunges the town into darkness, she partners with her guardian spirit Lumion to restore the electricity. Through heartwarming adventures helping townspeople and solving their problems, Lila discovers that even the smallest acts of kindness can illuminate the world and bring communities together.

Name: Summon Night
Description: Young apprentice Pratty or Collet enters the sacred Craftlord competition to become the ultimate weapon forger. With their loyal Guardian Beast companion, they must master the ancient arts of smithing while battling through dungeons filled with monsters and mysteries. Through friendship, craftsmanship, and courage, this hero discovers that true strength comes from the bonds forged between craftsman and creation, teacher and student, in their quest for mastery.

Name: Super Metroid
Description: Bounty hunter Samus Aran returns to planet Zebes when the last Metroid is stolen by the resurrected Space Pirates and their leader Ridley. Exploring the vast underground caverns, she discovers new power-ups and abilities while uncovering the tragic history of the extinct Chozo civilization. In a final confrontation with the mighty Mother Brain, Samus must make the ultimate sacrifice to escape Zebes' destruction and honor the memory of her fallen protectors.

Name: VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
Description: Bartender Jill serves drinks and listens to stories in the dystopian cyberpunk city of Glitch City. Working at the dive bar VA-11 Hall-A, she encounters hackers, androids, and corporate executives while mixing cocktails that influence their moods and decisions. Through intimate conversations with regulars like the hacker Dorothy and journalist Dana, Jill discovers that sometimes the most important connections are made over a perfectly crafted drink.

Name: Deadlink
Description: Elite corporate operative Shell infiltrates enemy facilities by remotely controlling powerful combat androids in this cyberpunk roguelite. Armed with high-tech weapons and upgradeable abilities, she battles through procedurally generated levels filled with hostile security forces and deadly robots. Each run offers new weapon combinations and tactical approaches as Shell uncovers a corporate conspiracy threatening the resistance. Through fast-paced gunplay and strategic planning, players discover that in this digital war, death is just another way to gather intelligence.

Name: Nunholy
Description: Warrior nun Sister Belladonna fights through procedurally generated dungeons filled with unholy creatures and demonic abominations in this roguelite beat 'em up. Armed with blessed weapons and divine miracles, she battles through waves of enemies while collecting relics and power-ups that enhance her combat abilities. Each run through the cursed cathedral offers new challenges and weapon combinations as she seeks to purge the corruption spreading through sacred grounds. Through fast-paced combat and divine intervention, Sister Belladonna discovers that sometimes salvation requires a heavy fist.

Name: Disney's Hercules
Description: Young hero Hercules discovers his divine heritage and embarks on a journey to prove himself a true hero worthy of joining the gods on Mount Olympus. Guided by the satyr Philoctetes, he trains to master his incredible strength while battling monsters sent by the evil Hades. With the beautiful Megara by his side, Hercules learns that true heroism comes not from divine power, but from the courage to sacrifice everything for those he loves.

Name: Dead Nation
Description: Survivors Jack McReady and Scarlett Blake fight through zombie-infested cities in a world overrun by the undead plague. Armed with an arsenal of weapons from pistols to flamethrowers, they battle hordes of flesh-hungry zombies while searching for other survivors and a cure. Through darkened streets and abandoned buildings, they uncover the truth behind the outbreak while fighting for humanity's survival. In this apocalyptic nightmare, every bullet counts and death lurks around every corner.

Name: The Whispered World
Description: Melancholy circus clown Sadwick discovers he's the key to preventing the apocalyptic Silence that threatens to consume all existence. Accompanied by his loyal pet Spot, he embarks on a surreal journey through a dying fantasy world filled with strange creatures and ancient mysteries. With the help of the wise Corona and other allies, Sadwick must overcome his own self-doubt and depression to fulfill a prophecy. Through beautiful hand-drawn landscapes and emotional storytelling, he learns that even the saddest soul can become a hero.

Name: Kingdom Hearts Re:coded
Description: Data version of Sora awakens within Jiminy's Journal to investigate mysterious messages that have appeared in its pages. With Donald Duck and Goofy, he explores digitized versions of familiar Disney worlds corrupted by bugs and data glitches. Through unique gameplay mechanics and puzzle-solving, Data-Sora uncovers a deeper mystery about the pain and memories connected to those who have been hurt. This digital journey reveals crucial information about the true nature of the heart's connections across different worlds.

Name: Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror
Description:
Agent Gabe Logan infiltrates a secret facility to investigate the mysterious Red Section conspiracy threatening global security with stolen military technology and deadly bioweapons.
With partner Lian Xing, he navigates a labyrinth of international espionage where every corridor hides corrupt government agents and mercenary assassins willing to kill for the right price.
Armed with cutting-edge high-tech gadgets and tactical weapons, Logan discovers that in this world of mirrors and digital deception, the greatest threats don't come from enemy territory—they emerge from the darkest corners of his own agency.

Name: Just Cause 2
Description: Agent Rico Rodriguez parachutes into the tropical island nation of Panau to overthrow the corrupt dictator Baby Panay and locate his missing handler. Armed with his signature grappling hook and unlimited parachutes, he creates chaos across the island by destroying government installations and causing massive explosions. Working with three rival factions, Rico discovers that his former mentor has gone rogue and is planning something far more dangerous than a simple coup. Through spectacular stunts and open-world mayhem, he learns that sometimes the best way to save a country is to destroy it first.

Name: Disney's Tarzan
Description: Young Tarzan grows up among the gorillas of Africa after being raised by the gentle Kala following his parents' tragic death. Swinging through lush jungle environments, he must prove himself to the skeptical silverback Kerchak while protecting his family from the dangerous hunter Clayton. When explorer Jane arrives to study gorillas, Tarzan discovers his human heritage and must choose between two worlds. Through vine-swinging adventures and jungle exploration, he learns that home isn't about where you come from, but who you choose to protect.

Name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
Description: Viking warrior Eivor leads the Raven Clan from Norway to the hostile lands of 9th-century England, seeking a new home for their people. Caught between the fading Norse gods and the rise of Christianity, Eivor must forge alliances with Saxon kingdoms while battling the mysterious Order of the Ancients. Through brutal raids and political intrigue, they discover their connection to the ancient conflict between Assassins and Templars. In this epic saga of conquest and destiny, Eivor learns that true glory comes not from the promise of Valhalla, but from the legacy they leave behind.

Name: Exist Archive: The Other Side of the Sky
Description: Twelve students die in a mysterious explosion but awaken on the floating continent of Protolexa, where they discover they've been chosen as vessels for the souls of ancient gods. Student Kanata and his classmate Renko must master divine powers while exploring this strange world filled with mechanical creatures and floating ruins. As they uncover the truth behind their resurrection, they learn they're pawns in a cosmic war between the gods and the mysterious Deus Ex Machina. Through tactical combat and deepening friendships, these unlikely heroes must decide whether to fulfill their divine destiny or forge their own path.

Name: Samurai Deeper Kyo
Description: The legendary swordsman Demon Eyes Kyo awakens within the body of the gentle Mibu Kyoshiro, creating a deadly internal struggle between light and darkness. With bounty hunter Yuya Shiina and the stoic warrior Benitora, they search for Kyo's original body while battling the fearsome Twelve God Shogun. Through intense sword fights and supernatural powers, this tale of vengeance and redemption explores the thin line between hero and demon. In a world where the strongest fighters determine fate, Kyo must confront his bloody past to protect those he's learned to care about.

Name: Laika: Aged Through Blood
Description: Aging warrior Laika rides her motorcycle through a post-apocalyptic wasteland, fighting to protect her tribe from the oppressive Birds that have conquered their homeland. Armed with her trusty gun and acrobatic skills, she performs death-defying stunts while gunning down enemies in intense motorcycle combat. As she witnesses the toll of endless war on her people and her own aging body, Laika must train the next generation to continue the fight. Through fluid motion and bullet-time action, this mother warrior learns that true victory isn't measured in kills, but in the future she leaves for her daughter and tribe.

Name: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox
Description: Adventurer Adol Christin finds himself trapped within the prison city of Balduq after being cursed by the mysterious Aprilis. Transformed into a supernatural being called a Monstrum, he gains incredible powers but becomes bound to the city's walls. Alongside fellow Monstrum including the sharpshooter White Cat and warrior Hawk, Adol must defend the city from otherworldly Lemures while uncovering the truth behind an ancient conspiracy. Through fast-paced combat and exploration, he discovers that breaking his curse may require the ultimate sacrifice.

Name: Disney's Toy Story
Description:
Young cowboy Woody faces his greatest challenge when space ranger action figure Buzz Lightyear arrives and becomes Andy's new favorite toy.
Jealousy turns to adventure when both toys must work together to escape the cruel clutches of the toy-torturing neighbor Sid and find their way back to their beloved owner.
In a world where toys come alive when humans aren't watching, friendship conquers rivalry as Woody and Buzz discover that being a toy means being there for the child who loves you, no matter what.

Name: The 3rd Birthday
Description:
Federal agent Aya Brea awakens with amnesia in a post-apocalyptic New York City overrun by grotesque creatures called the Twisted.
Using her mysterious ability to overdive into other people's bodies and her parasite-enhanced powers, she fights alongside the military organization CTI to investigate the twisted time anomalies threatening to destroy reality itself.
As memories slowly return, Aya discovers dark truths about her connection to the High Ones and must confront painful sacrifices from her past to save humanity's future from the encroaching Babel towers that threaten to unravel time itself.

Name: Dragon's Crown
Description:
Six adventurers seek the legendary Dragon's Crown, an ancient artifact capable of controlling dragons, in the medieval kingdom of Hydeland.
From the nimble Elf and powerful Dwarf to the mystical Sorceress and deadly Amazon, each warrior brings unique skills to battle through ancient ruins filled with undead horrors and massive bosses.
But as they venture deeper into forgotten dungeons and face the machinations of the Demon Lord, the heroes discover that the crown's power comes with a terrible price that could doom the very kingdom they seek to protect.

Name: Bakusou Kyoudai Let's & Go!!: Eternal Wings
Description:
Brothers Retsu and Go Seiba enter the thrilling world of Mini 4WD racing with their custom-built machines.
Under the guidance of the mysterious Dr. Tsuchiya, they upgrade their cars with advanced parts and compete against rival racers from around the world in high-speed tournaments.
As they face increasingly challenging tracks and opponents wielding powerful prototype machines, the brothers must master both racing strategy and the special abilities of their Eternal Wings to claim victory in the ultimate World Championship.

Name: Devil May Cry 4
Description:
Young Nero, a demon hunter of the holy Order of the Sword, witnesses the legendary white-haired devil hunter Dante assassinate the order's leader during a sacred ceremony.
Armed with his glowing blue Devil Bringer arm and the roaring Red Queen sword, Nero pursues Dante through the gothic demon-infested city of Fortuna while uncovering a dark conspiracy involving his beloved Kyrie and the order's true demonic agenda.
As crimson demons pour from hellish portals and both hunters face increasingly nightmarish creatures, they discover Nero's shocking connection to the legendary dark knight Sparda's bloodline, forcing them to combine their demonic powers to prevent the resurrection of the Demon Emperor and save humanity from eternal damnation.
DescriptionArabic:
يشهد نيرو الشاب، صياد الشياطين في وسام السيف المقدس، صياد الشياطين الأسطوري ذا الشعر الأبيض دانتي وهو يغتال زعيم الوسام أثناء احتفال مقدس‪.‬
مسلحاً بذراعه الزرقاء المتوهجة جالب الشيطان وسيف الملكة الحمراء الهادر، يطارد نيرو دانتي عبر مدينة فورتونا القوطية الموبوءة بالشياطين بينما يكشف مؤامرة مظلمة تورط حبيبته كيري والأجندة الشيطانية الحقيقية للوسام‪.‬
بينما تنساب الشياطين القرمزية من بوابات الجحيم ويواجه كلا الصيادين مخلوقات كابوسية متزايدة، يكتشفان صلة نيرو المذهلة بسلالة الفارس المظلم الأسطوري سباردا، مما يجبرهما على دمج قواهما الشيطانية لمنع بعث إمبراطور الشياطين وإنقاذ البشرية من اللعنة الأبدية‪.‬

Name: Super Princess Peach
Description:
For once, Princess Peach takes center stage as the hero when Bowser captures Mario, Luigi, and the Toads using a magical artifact that spreads negative emotions across the Mushroom Kingdom.
Armed with her magical parasol and the power to harness her emotions—Rage for strength, Gloom for tears, Joy for flight, and Calm for healing—Peach embarks on her own adventure through eight worlds to rescue the men who usually save her.

Name: Ys VI: The Ark of Napishtim
Shin Megami Tensei Devil Summoner: Raidou Kuzunoha vs. The Soulless Army
Description:
In 1931 Tokyo, young devil summoner Raidou Kuzunoha XIV works as a private detective, using his supernatural abilities to solve mysteries involving demons in the Taisho era.
When a student at Imperial Capital University becomes possessed by demons, Raidou investigates a conspiracy involving the mysterious Red Cape and an army of soulless soldiers threatening to plunge Japan into chaos.
Accompanied by his demonic cat Gouto-Douji and wielding his sword alongside summoned demons, Raidou must uncover the truth behind the Soulless Army before Tokyo falls to supernatural terror.

Name: Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition Remix
Description:
Street racers compete in underground circuits across Detroit, San Diego, and Atlanta, customizing their rides with DUB magazine-style modifications including massive rims, neon lights, and booming sound systems.
Players build their reputation by winning races, evading police in high-speed chases, and earning respect from rival crews while climbing the ranks of the illegal street racing scene.
From muscle cars to imports to luxury rides, every vehicle can be transformed with hydraulics, custom paint, and performance upgrades as racers chase the ultimate prize of becoming the most feared driver in the midnight racing world.

Name: Satisfactory
Description:
FICSIT engineer lands on alien planet Massage-2(A-B)b with a mission to extract resources and build massive automated factories to meet corporate quotas for Project Assembly.
Starting with basic tools, she must harvest iron ore, copper, and coal while constructing conveyor belts, factories, and power grids that transform the wilderness into a sprawling industrial complex.
As automation grows complex and hostile alien creatures attack her facilities, the engineer must balance efficiency with survival while uncovering the mysterious purpose behind FICSIT's true agenda on this distant world.

Name: Neo Contra
Description:
In the year 4444 AD, elite Contra soldiers Bill Rizer and Jaguar are pulled from cryogenic sleep to face the terrorist group Neo Contra and their leader Master Contra.
Using an innovative lock-on targeting system, the duo battles through futuristic environments filled with biomechanical enemies and massive boss creatures while uncovering the truth behind Project C and the mysterious Gaia satellite.
As the conspiracy deepens and reality itself becomes questioned, Bill and Jaguar must determine who they can trust in a world where the line between hero and enemy has been erased by genetic manipulation and corporate betrayal.

Name: Coffee Talk: Episode 2 - Hibiscus & Butterfly
Description:
Three years after the original café closed, the barista reopens their late-night coffee shop in alternate-reality Seattle where humans coexist with fantasy creatures, welcoming back familiar faces like the elf journalist Freya and werewolf Gala.
New customers include the struggling vampire Lucas dealing with societal prejudice and mysterious newcomer Riona who brings her own secrets and challenges to the close-knit community.
Through mixing the perfect drinks—from Blue Moon Blend to Butterfly Pea Latte—the barista helps customers navigate personal growth, relationship struggles, and the challenges of finding belonging in a world that doesn't always accept differences.

Name: Sniper Elite III
Description:
OSS sniper Karl Fairburne infiltrates North Africa in 1942 to investigate and sabotage a secret Nazi super-weapon program known as Ratte that could change the course of World War II.
Operating behind enemy lines across the harsh Libyan desert, Karl uses authentic WWII weapons and stealth tactics to eliminate high-value targets while gathering intelligence on the mysterious Afrika Korps operation.
From long-distance precision shots with his Springfield rifle to close-quarters infiltration of heavily fortified bases, Karl must survive encounters with German patrols, enemy snipers, and the unforgiving desert environment where one wrong move means death in this deadly game of cat and mouse.

Name: Fire Emblem - The Sacred Stones
Description:
Twin rulers Princess Eirika and Prince Ephraim of Renais must reclaim their kingdom after the Grado Empire launches a devastating invasion that kills their father.
As the siblings lead separate armies across the continent of Magvel, they discover that their childhood friend Prince Lyon has been possessed by the ancient evil Demon King and seeks to destroy the five Sacred Stones that seal away darkness.
In this tactical RPG, strategic positioning and permadeath consequences make every battle a life-or-death decision as the twins fight to restore peace and prevent the resurrection of ultimate evil.

Name: One Finger Death Punch
Description:
A lone stick figure warrior stands against endless waves of enemies using only perfectly timed left and right mouse clicks to unleash devastating martial arts combos.
Inspired by classic kung fu movies, this minimalist fighter features no complex controls—just pure timing and reflexes as the hero battles through hundreds of levels filled with ninjas, swordsmen, and massive boss fights.
From lightning-fast punches to weapon-based combat, every click unleashes cinematic action sequences where split-second timing means the difference between victory and death.

Name: Pentiment
Description:
In 1518, artist and scribe Andreas Maler arrives at the monastery of Kiersau Abbey in Bavaria to complete his masterpiece illuminated manuscript while the world transforms through the Protestant Reformation.
When a murder shatters the peaceful monastery community, Andreas must investigate using his artistic skills and growing knowledge of the residents' secrets, making choices that will affect relationships across generations.
Through hand-drawn art that mimics medieval illuminated manuscripts, this narrative adventure explores themes of faith, art, and social change as Andreas discovers that his decisions ripple through time, affecting not only his own life but the legacy he leaves for future generations.

Name: DOOM + DOOM II
Description:
Marine Doomguy battles through the UAC Mars facility and the depths of Hell itself using an arsenal of weapons including the iconic shotgun, chaingun, and BFG 9000.
From the research facilities overrun by demons to Earth's invasion in the sequel, this definitive collection includes both legendary campaigns plus expansions, presenting the fast-paced action that defined the FPS genre.
With relentless combat against Imps, Cacodemons, and the terrifying Cyberdemon, one man's war against the forces of darkness becomes legendary.

Name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 2
Description:
Captain Monkey D. Luffy and the Straw Hat Pirates battle through massive enemy armies in this action-packed musou adventure featuring the rubber-powered hero and his diverse crew.
From Roronoa Zoro's three-sword style to Nami's weather manipulation and Sanji's devastating kicks, each crew member brings unique abilities to demolish hundreds of foes at once.
As they chase the legendary treasure One Piece, the pirates face off against the World Government, rival pirate crews, and the fearsome Blackbeard Pirates in their quest to make Luffy the Pirate King.

Name: Soulcalibur III
Description:
Warriors across the world continue their eternal quest for the legendary blade Soul Calibur and its cursed counterpart Soul Edge in this weapon-based fighting tournament.
From the holy knight Siegfried wielding his massive zweihander to the nimble pirate Cervantes with his sword and pistol, each fighter brings a unique weapon style and fighting philosophy to the arena.
As the cursed sword's influence spreads and new challengers emerge, including the mysterious Zasalamel and deadly assassin Tira, the stage of history enters a new chapter where destiny will be decided by the sword.

Name: Bomberman Generation
Description:
Bomberman must rescue the Lightning Cards and his kidnapped friends from the evil Mujoe and his Hige Hige Bandits across five diverse worlds.
Accompanied by his loyal Charabom creatures that provide special abilities, Bomberman explores 3D environments filled with puzzles, platforming challenges, and classic bomb-based combat.
From riding through water levels on sea creatures to navigating treacherous volcanic caves, this adventure combines traditional Bomberman action with exploration and creature-collection elements in a quest to save both his friends and the universe.

Name: A Way Out
Description:
Two prisoners Leo and Vincent form an unlikely alliance to escape from Shady Pines Penitentiary and seek revenge against crime boss Harvey who betrayed them both.
This split-screen cooperative adventure requires two players to work together through every moment, from planning the prison break to executing elaborate heists and high-speed chases across the country.
As their partnership deepens and dark secrets about their past emerge, the two men discover that their quest for vengeance may force them to confront not only their enemies but each other in a story where friendship and loyalty are tested by the ultimate betrayal.

Name: Bleach: The Blade of Fate
Description:
Soul Reaper Ichigo Kurosaki and fellow warriors from the Soul Society battle against Hollows and other supernatural enemies in this fast-paced fighting game.
From Rukia Kuchiki's ice-based attacks to Uryu Ishida's spirit arrows and Captain Byakuya's deadly cherry blossom techniques, each character wields unique Zanpakuto abilities.
As Ichigo masters his Bankai transformation and faces increasingly powerful foes, the fate of both the living world and Soul Society hangs in the balance of these supernatural sword battles.

Name: Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice
Description:
Celtic warrior Senua embarks on a harrowing journey into the Norse underworld to rescue the soul of her deceased lover Dillion from the goddess Hela.
Suffering from severe psychosis that manifests as tormenting voices in her head, Senua must navigate both external mythological horrors and her own fractured mental state as she confronts terrifying creatures and solves reality-bending puzzles.
Through a deeply personal narrative that explores themes of mental illness, grief, and love, this psychological action-adventure presents an unflinching portrayal of one woman's battle against both literal and metaphorical demons.

Name: The Misadventures of Tron Bonne
Description:
Pirate mechanic Tron Bonne must pay off her family's massive debt to the Reaverbots by commanding her loyal army of Servbots in elaborate heists and missions across Ryship Island.
Using her giant mecha Gustaff and the enthusiastic but bumbling Servbots, Tron undertakes everything from bank robberies to archaeological excavations, all while dealing with the incompetence of her mechanical minions.
As she manages her crew's training, builds new machines, and executes increasingly ambitious schemes to earn zenny, Tron discovers that being a successful pirate requires more than just advanced technology—it takes cunning, patience, and the ability to keep 40 identical robots from causing chaos.

Name: Darkest Dungeon
Description:
An ancestral estate harbors unspeakable horrors beneath its foundations, driving the heir to assemble a band of flawed heroes to cleanse the Darkest Dungeon of its eldritch corruption.
Each expedition into the twisted catacombs tests not only the party's combat skills but their sanity and resolve, as stress and afflictions prove as deadly as any monster.
In this turn-based nightmare where hope is a precious commodity and death is permanent, heroes must manage their mental health while confronting cosmic terrors that defy comprehension.

Name: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn
Description:
Gunpowder sapper Nor Vanek and her mystical companion Enki fight to break the gods' army siege that has plunged the world into eternal darkness.
Armed with flintlock weapons and magical abilities, they traverse a world where undead legions roam under the command of vengeful deities seeking to reclaim their dominion.
This action-RPG blends gunpowder combat with magic as Nor and Enki explore ancient ruins and battle through hordes of supernatural enemies in their quest to restore the dawn to a world trapped in perpetual night.

Name: Sanctum
Description:
On the alien world of Elysion One, humanity's last bastion faces extinction as relentless waves of alien creatures breach their defenses.
Engineer Skye must construct defensive towers and walls while personally fighting on the front lines with her arsenal of futuristic weapons to protect the core from destruction.
This innovative blend of tower defense and first-person shooting challenges players to balance strategic resource management with intense combat as they hold the line against increasingly powerful alien swarms in humanity's final stand.

Name: Jackie Chan Adventures
Description:
Martial arts master Jackie Chan embarks on a globe-spanning adventure to prevent the Dark Hand organization from collecting the twelve Demon Talismans that could unleash ancient evil upon the world.
Accompanied by his wise Uncle and spirited niece Jade, Jackie combines his signature acrobatic fighting style with magical artifacts to battle through mystical temples and dangerous strongholds.
From the sewers of San Francisco to the peaks of the Himalayas, this action-adventure brings the beloved animated series to life with humor, heart, and high-flying martial arts action.

Name: Need for Speed: The Run
Description:
Street racer Jack Rourke faces death when the mob puts a hit on his head, forcing him to enter a cross-country race from San Francisco to New York as his only chance for survival.
With 200 ruthless racers competing in the underground Run and hit squads hunting him at every turn, Jack must navigate treacherous mountain passes, scorching deserts, and bustling cities while outrunning both the competition and certain death.
This high-octane thriller blends cinematic storytelling with intense racing action as Jack fights for his life across 3,000 miles of the most dangerous roads in America, where finishing second means never finishing at all.

Name: Judgment
Description:
Disgraced lawyer turned private detective Takayuki Yagami investigates a series of brutal murders in Tokyo's Kamurocho district where the killer removes victims' eyes as a twisted signature.
Using his martial arts skills and detective instincts, Yagami uncovers a conspiracy involving the yakuza, corrupt police officers, and a mysterious medical scandal that threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.
This noir thriller combines investigative gameplay with intense combat as Yagami follows leads through seedy bars, hostess clubs, and dangerous back alleys in his quest for justice.

Name: Star Ocean: The Divine Force
Description:
Space captain Raymond Lawrence crash-lands on the underdeveloped planet Aster IV and teams up with princess Laeticia to prevent an interdimensional invasion that threatens both their worlds.
As the Pangalactic Federation faces its greatest crisis, Raymond must navigate the delicate balance between advanced technology and medieval society while uncovering the truth behind the Kronos organization's sinister plans.
This sci-fi JRPG combines real-time combat with exploration across vast alien landscapes and ancient ruins as players uncover the connection between past civilizations and the cosmic threat that could destroy everything.

Name: Gran Turismo 2
Description:
Racing enthusiasts enter the ultimate automotive simulation featuring over 650 meticulously detailed cars from legendary manufacturers like Ferrari, Porsche, and McLaren across diverse racing disciplines.
From the high-speed Test Course oval to the technical challenges of Deep Forest Raceway, drivers progress through Simulation Mode and Arcade Mode while tuning and upgrading their vehicles.
This definitive driving experience captures the pure joy of motorsport with unprecedented realism, setting the standard for automotive simulation that celebrates the beauty and engineering of the world's greatest cars.

Name: Double Dragon
Description:
Twin martial artists Billy and Jimmy Lee fight through the mean streets to rescue Billy's girlfriend Marian from the ruthless Black Warriors gang led by the machine gun-wielding Willy.
Using their mastery of Sōsetsuken martial arts, the brothers battle through city slums, industrial complexes, and the gang's fortress hideout while wielding improvised weapons like baseball bats and whips.
This classic side-scrolling beat 'em up pioneered cooperative gameplay and combo-based combat, creating a template for the genre with its memorable characters, iconic soundtrack, and the legendary brotherly rivalry that could turn allies into enemies at any moment.

Name: Sanabi
Description:
Veteran agent SANABI awakens with cybernetic enhancements and a lost arm after a mission gone wrong, only to discover his former organization has turned against him in the dystopian megacity of Mago City.
Armed with a versatile prosthetic chain hook that doubles as both weapon and traversal tool, SANABI teams up with a mysterious hacker girl named Mari to uncover the truth behind a corporate conspiracy involving human experimentation.
This stylish 2D action-platformer blends cyberpunk aesthetics with fluid chain-swinging mechanics as players navigate neon-lit skyscrapers and battle through high-tech facilities while piecing together SANABI's forgotten past and the dark secrets that led to his betrayal.

Name: Severed Steel
Description:
A one-armed sharpshooter battles through procedurally generated corporate facilities using bullet-time abilities and devastating environmental destruction to take down waves of robotic enemies.
With no manual reload system, players must constantly move and grab weapons from fallen foes while executing wall-running, diving, and sliding maneuvers through fully destructible environments.
This high-octane FPS emphasizes fluid movement and creative gunplay as players blast through glass walls, concrete barriers, and steel structures in stylized action sequences that celebrate pure kinetic combat.

Name: Orcs Must Die! 2
Description:
War Mage and Sorceress team up to defend their fortress from endless waves of bloodthirsty orcs using an arsenal of deadly traps, weapons, and magical abilities.
Players strategically place spear traps, floor spikes, arrow walls, and explosive barrels while fighting alongside them using crossbows, swords, and devastating spells.
This cooperative tower defense game emphasizes creative carnage as players work together to survive increasingly challenging orc invasions while earning skulls to upgrade their defensive arsenal.

Name: Batman: Arkham Origins
Description:
Young Bruce Wayne faces his deadliest night yet when crime lord Black Mask places a $50 million bounty on Batman's head, drawing eight of the world's most dangerous assassins to Gotham City.
On Christmas Eve, Batman must survive encounters with killers like Deathstroke, Bane, and the psychotic Joker while forging his first alliance with Captain Gordon.
This prequel explores Batman's early years as he learns to balance his role as both Dark Knight and detective, uncovering a conspiracy that threatens to tear apart the corrupt foundations of Gotham's underworld.

Name: Persona 4: Dancing All Night
Description:
Yu Narukami and the Investigation Team return to battle supernatural forces through the power of dance and music when a mysterious group threatens to trap people's souls in a twisted midnight stage.
As idol Rise Kujikawa prepares for her comeback concert, she discovers that fans are falling into comas after watching cursed performances, forcing the team to enter the Midnight Stage where rhythm and timing become weapons.
This musical spin-off combines Persona 4's beloved characters with dance gameplay, featuring remixed versions of iconic tracks as players battle Shadows through perfectly timed dance moves and Persona summons.

Name: Until Dawn
Description:
Eight friends return to an isolated mountain lodge one year after a tragic prank led to the disappearance of twin sisters Hannah and Beth Washington, only to find themselves stalked by something far more terrifying than guilt.
As supernatural forces and ancient creatures hunt them through the snow-covered wilderness, every choice determines who lives and who dies in this branching horror narrative.
Players must navigate complex relationships, uncover dark secrets about the mountain's history, and make split-second decisions that ripple throughout the story, where the butterfly effect means even the smallest action can lead to salvation or doom.

Name: Pocky & Rocky 2
Description:
Shrine maiden Pocky teams up with her tanuki friend Rocky to stop the evil Black Mantis from conquering both the human and yokai worlds with his army of vengeful spirits.
Armed with sacred ofuda talismans and Rocky's shape-shifting abilities, the duo battles through haunted forests, demon castles, and supernatural dimensions filled with Japanese folklore creatures.
This cooperative top-down shooter blends cute characters with intense action as players dodge bullet patterns while unleashing powerful special attacks and collecting power-ups in their quest to restore peace between worlds.

Name: Unicorn Overlord
Description:
Exiled prince Alain returns to reclaim his rightful throne from the tyrannical Zenoiran Empire that conquered his homeland of Cornia with the help of liberation armies across five diverse nations.
Leading massive tactical battles with over 60 unique characters, Alain must forge alliances with elves, angels, beast-kin, and other fantastical races while uncovering the dark conspiracy behind the empire's power.
This grand strategy RPG combines real-time tactical combat with deep character relationships and branching storylines as players rebuild their kingdom, liberate oppressed peoples, and restore the Ring of the Unicorn that will bring peace to the war-torn continent.

Name: Enotria: The Last Song
Description:
In a realm trapped by the Canovacci, eternal theatrical performances that bind reality itself, a lone Maskless One awakens with the power to change fate by donning different masks that alter their abilities and combat style.
Inspired by Italian folklore and Commedia dell'Arte, this world is ruled by the Authors who control the unchanging script, forcing inhabitants to repeat the same roles forever while the Maskless One seeks to break free from this predetermined destiny.
This souls-like adventure combines challenging combat with mask-switching mechanics as players explore a beautifully crafted Mediterranean fantasy world, battling twisted performers and uncovering the truth behind the eternal masquerade.

Name: Super Mario Maker 2
Description:
Mario and friends discover the ultimate creative playground where players can design, build, and share their own Super Mario Bros. levels using an expanded toolkit of elements from across the franchise's history.
With new features like slopes, 3D World style, night themes, and the cooperative Story Mode, creators can craft everything from traditional platforming challenges to elaborate puzzle contraptions and artistic showcases.
This definitive level creation experience empowers millions of players to become game designers, sharing their imagination through endless courses while exploring an infinite universe of user-generated content that transforms the classic Mario formula into limitless possibilities.

Name: Wylde Flowers
Description:
City-dweller Tara inherits her grandmother's farm on Fairhaven Island and discovers she comes from a long line of witches, learning to balance her new magical abilities with the demands of rural life and community relationships.
As Tara tends her crops, raises animals, and explores the island's mystical secrets, she must choose whether to reveal her magical heritage to the townspeople while helping them with both mundane problems and supernatural threats.
This cozy farming simulation combines traditional life-sim elements with spell-crafting, potion brewing, and inclusive storytelling that celebrates diversity as Tara builds relationships, uncovers family mysteries, and learns that magic is strongest when shared with a loving community.

Name: For The King II
Description:
The realm of Fahrul faces a new crisis as Queen Rosomon and her loyal subjects must defend against five simultaneous threats that could destroy the kingdom, from ancient evils awakening to political conspiracies tearing the realm apart.
A new party of adventurers must work together in this cooperative roguelike RPG, making strategic decisions on a hexagonal board while engaging in turn-based combat against bandits, monsters, and corrupted nobles.
This enhanced sequel features improved combat systems, expanded character customization, and multiple campaign paths as players explore a beautifully hand-drawn world where every choice matters and teamwork is essential for survival.

Name: Yoshi's Story
Description:
Baby Yoshi and his colorful friends must rescue their home Yoshi's Island from the evil Baby Bowser, who has stolen the Super Happy Tree and cast the island into sadness and shadow.
In this storybook adventure told through pop-up book style visuals, players guide the young dinosaurs through six magical pages, eating fruit to maintain happiness while solving puzzles and collecting heart coins.
This charming platformer emphasizes exploration over speed, encouraging players to discover hidden melons and secrets while enjoying a whimsical journey that celebrates the joy of childhood wonder and the power of friendship.

Name: Mega Man X8
Description:
Mega Man X and Zero face their greatest challenge yet when Sigma returns with a new plan to eliminate humanity by launching reploids to the moon aboard the massive Jakob Project space elevator.
Joined by new navigator Pallette and the mysterious reploid Axl, the Maverick Hunters must stop eight new Maverick bosses while uncovering a conspiracy that threatens both humans and reploids alike.
This final chapter in the original X series features enhanced gameplay mechanics, including tag-team battles and metal transformations, as the heroes race against time to prevent Sigma's ultimate plan from creating a reploid-only future.

Name: White Knight Chronicles: Origins
Description:
Young knight Cyrus discovers his destiny as the wielder of the ancient White Knight armor when the Yshrenian Empire threatens to conquer the peaceful kingdom of Balandor.
As civil war tears the land apart, Cyrus and his companions must master the power of the Incorruptus - massive magical suits of armor that can turn the tide of battle - while uncovering a conspiracy that reaches the highest levels of government.
This handheld prequel to the console series features strategic combat, character customization, and an epic story that explores the origins of the White Knight legend, as players forge alliances and make difficult choices that will determine the fate of the kingdom.

Name: Digimon World: Next Order
Description:
A mysterious virus threatens to destroy the Digital World, and only a human tamer armed with two Digimon partners can restore balance to this dying realm where once-peaceful creatures have turned violent and aggressive.
Players must carefully raise, train, and bond with their digital companions, managing their needs, evolution paths, and battle strategies while exploring a vast world filled with corrupted data and hostile Digimon.
This challenging adventure emphasizes the deep partnership between tamer and Digimon, featuring complex evolution mechanics, real-time combat, and difficult choices as players work to uncover the truth behind the virus while building unbreakable bonds with their digital friends.

Name: Monster Hunter 3 Ultimate
Description:
Skilled hunters venture into the treacherous seas surrounding Moga Village to track and battle colossal beasts like the devastating sea serpent Lagiacrus that threatens the peaceful fishing community.
Armed with massive weapons crafted from previous hunts, players must study monster behavior, exploit weaknesses, and coordinate attacks to bring down creatures dozens of times their size, from the explosive Barroth to the majestic Rathalos.
This definitive edition features enhanced underwater combat, expanded weapon movesets, and cooperative multiplayer hunts as players forge armor from fallen monsters, master complex combat systems, and protect civilization from the ancient powers that lurk in the untamed wilderness.

Name: Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc
Description:
Fifteen talented students find themselves trapped in the prestigious Hope's Peak Academy by the sinister Monokuma bear, who forces them into a deadly game where the only way to escape is to commit the perfect murder without being caught.
Student Makoto Naegi must investigate gruesome crime scenes, gather evidence, and participate in intense class trials where students debate and vote to expose the killer among them, knowing that a wrong verdict means death for the innocent.
This twisted visual novel blends murder mystery with psychological horror as players uncover the dark truth behind their imprisonment while watching their classmates turn against each other in a desperate struggle for survival and freedom.

Name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse
Description:
The Dragon Ball timeline faces destruction when mysterious villains begin altering key moments in history, forcing the Time Patrol to recruit a custom warrior from across dimensions to restore the proper flow of events.
Players create their own fighter and team up with iconic heroes like Goku, Vegeta, and Piccolo to battle through alternate versions of legendary battles, from the Saiyan Saga to the climactic showdown with Majin Buu.
This action-packed fighting game lets players customize their character's race, abilities, and combat style while experiencing an original story that celebrates the entire Dragon Ball saga through high-speed aerial combat and devastating super attacks.

Name: Uncharted: The Lost Legacy
Description: Chloe Frazer and Nadine Ross form an unlikely partnership to steal the legendary Tusk of Ganesh from the war-torn mountains of India. Racing against insurgent leader Asav, they must navigate ancient Hoysala temples and discover the true power of trust and friendship.

Name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered
Description: When the Emperor Uriel Septim VII is assassinated and the Amulet of Kings is stolen, the gates to Oblivion burst open across Cyrodiil. As the last heir to the throne remains hidden, a mysterious prisoner must navigate the complex politics of the Imperial City while facing the demonic forces of Mehrunes Dagon threatening to consume the world.

Name: Call of Juarez: Gunslinger
Description: Grizzled bounty hunter Silas Greaves spins tall tales of his legendary encounters with infamous outlaws Billy the Kid, Jesse James, and Butch Cassidy in a Kansas saloon. As his stories unfold, the line between truth and legend blurs, revealing the wild and dangerous world of the American West where justice is served at the end of a smoking barrel.

Name: Legend of Kay Anniversary
Description: Young warrior cat Kay discovers that the ancient balance of his homeland has been shattered when the evil Minister Shun and his gorilla army conquer the peaceful animal kingdoms. Armed with his trusty magic sword and guided by ancient martial arts wisdom, Kay must restore the power of the mystic stones and bring harmony back to his world.

Name: Hades
Description: Zagreus, immortal son of Hades, repeatedly attempts to escape the Underworld to reach the surface and find his missing mother Persephone. With each failed escape, he grows stronger with help from the Olympian gods, who aid his rebellion against his father while uncovering family secrets that threaten the very foundations of the underworld and mortal realm.
DescriptionArabic:
يحاول زاغريوس، الابن الخالد لـهادس، بشكل متكرر الهروب من العالم السفلي ليصل إلى السطح ويجد أمه المفقودة بيرسيفوني.
مع كل محاولة هروب فاشلة، يزداد قوة بمساعدة آلهة الأوليمب، الذين يساعدون تمرده ضد والده بينما يكشفون أسرار عائلية تهدد أسس العالم السفلي وعالم الفانيين.

Name: WarioWare, Inc.: Mega Party Games!
Description: The greedy Wario discovers he can make quick money by creating bizarre microgames for his new company WarioWare Inc. Recruiting his eccentric friends like the speedy Mona, the nature-loving 9-Volt, and the mysterious Orbulon, they create hundreds of lightning-fast four-second challenges that test players' reflexes and wit in this chaotic party experience filled with unexpected surprises.

Name: Core Keeper
Description: Awakening in a mysterious underground cavern, explorers discover they are the chosen Keepers tasked with reviving an ancient Core that maintains the balance between light and darkness. Mining deep into the earth, they uncover rare resources and face dangerous creatures while building automated systems and growing crops to sustain their subterranean civilization. Working together, players must defeat massive bosses and restore the Core's power before eternal darkness consumes the world.

Name: Saya no Uta
Description: After a traumatic accident, medical student Fuminori Sakisaka awakens from a coma with a horrific condition that makes him perceive the world as a nightmarish landscape of flesh and decay. The only thing that appears beautiful to him is the mysterious girl Saya, who becomes his anchor to sanity in this twisted reality. As their relationship deepens, dark secrets emerge about Saya's true nature and the supernatural forces threatening to consume both their souls in this psychological horror tale that explores the boundaries between love and madness.
DescriptionArabic:
بعد حادث مؤلم، يستيقظ طالب الطب فومينوري ساكيساكا من غيبوبة مع حالة مروعة تجعله يرى العالم كمشهد كابوسي من اللحم والتحلل.
الشيء الوحيد الذي يبدو جميلاً له هو الفتاة الغامضة سايا، التي تصبح مرساته للعقل في هذا الواقع الملتوي.
بينما تتعمق علاقتهما، تظهر أسرار مظلمة حول طبيعة سايا الحقيقية والقوى الخارقة التي تهدد بأن تلتهم روحيهما في هذه الحكاية النفسية المرعبة التي تستكشف الحدود بين الحب والجنون.

Name: Pink Panther: Pinkadelic Pursuit
