Description: The suave Pink Panther finds himself caught in a psychedelic adventure when the villainous Big Nose steals a powerful crystal that warps reality itself. Bouncing through surreal dreamscapes filled with bizarre obstacles and mind-bending puzzles, the Pink Panther must use his trademark cool and agility to navigate platforms that shift between dimensions. With his characteristic swagger, he collects pink diamonds and outsmarts enemies in this colorful quest to restore sanity to the cartoon world.

Name: Shenmue II
Description: Continuing his quest for revenge, Ryo Hazuki travels from Japan to the bustling streets of Hong Kong searching for clues about his father's murderer Lan Di. Exploring detailed environments from crowded markets to ancient temples, Ryo learns martial arts techniques, uncovers the mystery of the Dragon Mirror, and encounters allies like the wise Xiuying Hong who guide him deeper into a conspiracy involving ancient Chinese treasures and deadly secret organizations.
DescriptionArabic:
مواصلاً مهمته للانتقام، يسافر ريو هازوكي من اليابان إلى شوارع هونغ كونغ الصاخبة باحثاً عن أدلة حول قاتل والده لان دي.
مستكشفاً بيئات مفصلة من الأسواق المزدحمة إلى المعابد القديمة، يتعلم ريو تقنيات فنون القتال، ويكشف غموض مرآة التنين، ويلتقي بحلفاء مثل الحكيمة زيويينغ هونغ التي ترشده أعمق في مؤامرة تنطوي على كنوز صينية قديمة ومنظمات سرية فتاكة.

Name: Jujutsu Kaisen: Cursed Clash
Description: Students from Tokyo Jujutsu High including Yuji Itadori, Megumi Fushiguro, and Nobara Kugisaki battle against terrifying cursed spirits using their supernatural cursed techniques. Under the guidance of their mentor Satoru Gojo, they face the ultimate threat from the ancient curse Ryomen Sukuna in intense magical combat that determines the fate of humanity.

Name: Astral Ascent
Description: Four imprisoned heroes - the swift Ayla, mystical Kiran, technological Calie, and beastly Octave - attempt to escape the mystical prison of Garden by ascending through treacherous astral dimensions. Each run through the ever-changing zodiac realms brings them closer to freedom as they master new spells, face celestial guardians, and unlock the secrets of their mysterious imprisonment.

Name: Zero Escape: Zero Time Dilemma
Description: Nine participants wake up in an underground shelter complex and discover they're trapped in a deadly Decision Game orchestrated by the mysterious Zero. Split into three teams led by Junpei, Akane, and Sigma, they must solve mind-bending puzzles and make impossible moral choices that determine who lives and dies. As fragments of time shift and reality fractures, they uncover a conspiracy that threatens to destroy humanity through the power of the deadly morphogenetic field.

Name: LEGO Worlds
Description: Aspiring builders explore infinite LEGO worlds filled with creatures, landscapes, and hidden treasures waiting to be discovered. Using the magical Discovery Tool, players can copy and paste any object they find to create their own custom universes. From racing vehicles across desert dunes to building towering castles in enchanted forests, creativity knows no bounds in this sandbox adventure where imagination becomes reality.

Name: Pokémon Alpha Sapphire
Description: Young trainer Brendan or May embarks on an epic journey through the Hoenn region to become Pokémon Champion while stopping the evil Team Aqua from awakening the legendary sea Pokémon Kyogre. With powerful new Mega Evolution abilities and the mysterious Delta Episode featuring Rayquaza, trainers explore a beautifully reimagined world filled with adventure.

Name: Slam Dunk: Super Slams
Description: Delinquent turned basketball prodigy Hanamichi Sakuragi joins the Shohoku High School basketball team to impress his crush Haruko. Alongside ace player Rukawa and team captain Akagi, the underdog team battles fierce rivals in intense basketball matches as Sakuragi transforms from a street fighter into a legitimate basketball star through determination and teamwork.
DescriptionArabic:
ينضم الشقي المتحول إلى عبقري كرة سلة هاناميتشي ساكوراغي إلى فريق كرة السلة في مدرسة شوهوكو الثانوية لإعجاب حبيبته هاروكو.
إلى جانب اللاعب النجم روكاوا وقائد الفريق أكاغي، يحارب الفريق الضعيف منافسين أشداء في مباريات كرة سلة متوترة بينما يتحول ساكوراغي من مقاتل شوارع إلى نجم كرة سلة حقيقي من خلال العزيمة وروح الفريق.

Name: The Warriors
Description: When gang leader Cyrus is murdered at a peace summit in Van Cortlandt Park, The Warriors are framed for the crime. Led by Swan and the fierce Ajax, they must fight their way through hostile gang territory across New York City to reach their home turf in Coney Island. Battling the Baseball Furies, Rogues, and other rival gangs, they uncover the truth behind the conspiracy.

Name: The Legend of Legacy: HD Remastered
Description: Seven diverse adventurers - including the knight Owen, elementalist Eloise, and mysterious Meurs - explore the legendary island of Avalon to uncover its ancient secrets. Each character brings unique perspectives and abilities as they navigate turn-based battles using elemental contracts and discover the truth behind the island's mysterious singing stones and the lost civilization that once called Avalon home.

Name: Resident Evil Revelations
Description: When the luxury cruise ship Queen Zenobia disappears in the Mediterranean, Jill Valentine and Parker Luciani board the derelict vessel to investigate. Trapped aboard the nightmarish ship infested with deadly Ooze creatures, they uncover a conspiracy involving the terrorist organization Veltro. Meanwhile, Chris Redfield searches snowy mountains for clues about the T-Abyss virus that threatens to create an oceanic bio-disaster.

Name: Tomb Raider: Legend
Description: Archaeologist Lara Croft embarks on a globe-spanning quest to find the mystical sword fragments of King Arthur while searching for answers about her mother's disappearance years ago. From the icy mountains of Bolivia to the ancient temples of Peru, she faces dangerous traps and battles her former friend Amanda Evert who seeks the same artifacts. With the help of technology expert Zip and researcher Alister, Lara uncovers a conspiracy involving the mysterious Excalibur stone.

Name: FANTASIAN Neo Dimension
Description: When young Leo awakens with amnesia in a steampunk world, he discovers his connection to a mysterious force called Mechteria that threatens to consume all emotions and memories from existence. Joined by the determined Kina, wise Prickle, and other companions, he journeys through beautifully crafted diorama worlds created by Final Fantasy's Hironobu Sakaguchi. Using innovative battle mechanics and Dimengeon encounters, they must uncover Leo's forgotten past and stop the machine realm from erasing all human emotions.

Name: Pikmin 3
Description: Three space explorers from the starving planet Koppai - the brave Alph, engineer Brittany, and captain Charlie - crash-land on the mysterious planet PNF-404 in search of food sources. Working with colorful plant creatures called Pikmin - including new Rock Pikmin and Winged Pikmin - they must gather fruit to save their civilization while avoiding dangerous creatures and reuniting their separated team.
DeveloperNames: Nintendo EAD Software Development Group No.4

Name: Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin
Description: Spoiled harvest goddess Princess Sakuna is banished to the dangerous Hinoe Island with a group of human outcasts to investigate a demon infestation. Stripped of most of her divine powers, she must learn the ancient art of rice cultivation to regain her strength while battling fearsome demons using her magical raiment and farming tools as weapons. Through detailed farming simulation and intense combat, Sakuna discovers the true meaning of hard work and responsibility.

Name: Pokémon Platinum Version
Description: Young trainer Lucas or Dawn embarks on an epic adventure through the Sinnoh region to become Pokémon Champion while confronting the sinister Team Galactic and their leader Cyrus who seeks to destroy the world using legendary Pokémon Dialga and Palkia. With help from the antimatter Pokémon Giratina in the mysterious Distortion World, they must restore balance to space and time.

Name: Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair
Description: When the villainous Capital B uses his Hive Mind device to turn the peaceful Royal Beettalion Guard into his minions, chameleon Yooka and bat Laylee must rescue them to gain access to his deadly fortress. Building an army of bee allies through challenging 2D platforming levels, they prepare for the ultimate challenge: infiltrating the Impossible Lair where Queen Phoebee is held captive.

Name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection
Description: When Kirito and Asuna enter the virtual world of Underworld, they discover a civilization on the brink of war between the Human Empire and the Dark Territory. Alongside knight Eugeo and administrator Alice, they must master the mysterious Incarnate System to protect the artificial souls known as Fluctlights from both digital extinction and the machinations of the evil Administrator.

Name: New Super Mario Bros.
Description: When Princess Peach is once again kidnapped by the villainous Bowser and his son Bowser Jr., plumber hero Mario embarks on a classic side-scrolling adventure through eight worlds filled with Goombas, Koopa Troopas, and dangerous obstacles. Using power-ups like the Mega Mushroom and Blue Shell, Mario runs, jumps, and stomps his way through castles and fortresses to save the Mushroom Kingdom.
DescriptionArabic:
عندما تُخطف الأميرة بيتش مرة أخرى على يد الشرير باوزر وابنه باوزر جونيور، ينطلق بطل السباكة ماريو في مغامرة تمرير جانبي كلاسيكية عبر ثمانية عوالم مليئة بـغومبا وكوبا تروبا وعقبات خطيرة.
باستخدام قوى إضافية مثل الفطر العملاق والدرع الأزرق، يجري ماريو ويقفز ويدوس في طريقه عبر القلاع والحصون لإنقاذ مملكة الفطر.

Name: Growlanser VI: Precarious World
Description: In a world where humanity teeters on the brink of extinction, young Haschen awakens with mysterious powers and no memory of his past. Joined by the determined Reyna and other companions, he discovers he is connected to the ancient Growlanser warriors who once protected the world from extinction. As monstrous Screapers threaten to devour all life, Haschen must master his Ring Weapon abilities and make difficult choices that will determine the fate of humanity in this tactical RPG where every decision matters.

Name: Shinobi
Description: Master ninja Hotsuma awakens from a long slumber to discover that his clan, the Oboro, has been massacred and their souls trapped by the evil sorcerer Hiruko Ubusuna. Armed with the demonic blade Akujiki that devours souls, Hotsuma must navigate through Tokyo battling hordes of demons and hellspawn to free his fallen comrades. But the cursed sword demands constant feeding, threatening to consume Hotsuma's own soul if he cannot master its bloodthirsty hunger while seeking vengeance.

Name: Need for Speed: Nitro
Description: Street racers compete in underground racing events across vibrant cartoon-styled cities, customizing their rides with nitrous boosts and wild paint jobs. From the neon-lit streets of Rio de Janeiro to the winding roads of Madrid, drivers push their supercars to the limit in high-speed pursuits while avoiding police chases. With arcade-style racing mechanics and split-screen multiplayer, players compete for the ultimate prize: becoming the most notorious speed demon in the underground scene.

Name: Ghostwire: Tokyo
Description: When a mysterious fog engulfs Tokyo and causes the entire population to vanish, leaving only their clothes behind, young Akito finds himself possessed by the spirit of paranormal investigator KK. Together, they must navigate the eerily empty city filled with dangerous Visitors - supernatural entities from Japanese folklore. Using mystical hand weaving techniques and elemental powers, Akito battles these otherworldly threats while searching for his missing sister Mari and uncovering the truth behind Tokyo's supernatural apocalypse.

Name: Viewtiful Joe: Red Hot Rumble
Description: Superhero movie star Viewtiful Joe and his girlfriend Silvia compete in a reality TV fighting tournament alongside classic characters like Captain Blue and villainous Fire Leo. Using signature VFX powers like slow motion and speed up abilities, fighters battle through destructible movie set environments in this cel-shaded brawler. The winner gets to star in their own superhero movie, but the competition heats up when the mysterious Black V-Watch threatens the Movieland dimension.

Name: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX 2
Description: In a dystopian future where Adepts are hunted by the totalitarian Sumeragi Group, the mysterious Copen pilots his advanced Bullit Dash technology to combat supernatural threats. Accompanied by the AI Lola, he faces off against powerful Adepts using high-speed combat and EX Weapons while uncovering a conspiracy involving the Butterfly Effect and the fate of all Minos survivors seeking freedom.

Name: Opus: Echo of Starsong
Description: Wandering asteroid miner Jun discovers the mysterious Eda, a witch who can communicate with asteroids and hear their ancient songs, in the dangerous Thousand Peaks region. Together with the determined Lisa, they embark on a perilous journey to find the legendary Starsong - a rare ore that could change everything. Through stunning hand-painted visuals and emotional storytelling, this space adventure explores themes of love, sacrifice, and the price of dreams.

Name: Citizen Sleeper
Description: A digitized human consciousness awakens in a deteriorating synthetic body aboard the massive space station Erlin's Eye, pursued by the ruthless corporation that created them. Known only as a Sleeper, they must navigate the complex politics of the station's diverse inhabitants while their body slowly breaks down without vital stabilizer drugs. Through dice-rolling mechanics representing their failing system, they forge relationships with smugglers like Lem, hackers like Feng, and other outcasts seeking freedom in the void of space.

Name: Crash of the Titans
Description: When the evil Dr. Neo Cortex and his niece Nina Cortex devise a plan to mutate the island's creatures into powerful Titans, orange marsupial Crash Bandicoot must use his new ability to jack these massive beasts and turn them against their creators. With his sister Coco captured and the Wumpa Islands under threat, Crash must master combat with creatures like the Rhinoroller and Magmadon to save his home.

Name: Sword of Mana
Description: When the ancient Mana Tree is threatened by the evil Dark Lord who seeks to drain its power for world domination, two heroes - the brave Hero and the determined Heroine - embark on separate but intertwined quests. Guided by the fairy Wisp and wielding the legendary Sword of Mana, they must gather the eight Mana Spirits and restore balance to the world before darkness consumes all life and magic.

Name: Twisted Metal: Head-On: Extra Twisted Edition
Description: The enigmatic Calypso revives his notorious vehicular combat tournament, inviting a diverse array of contestants, each with unique vehicles and personal desires. Participants, ranging from the psychotic clown Sweet Tooth to the vengeful ex-cop Outlaw, battle across global arenas, from the streets of Paris to the deserts of Egypt, all vying for the chance to have their deepest wishes granted. However, Calypso's interpretations of these wishes often lead to unforeseen and ironic outcomes.

Name: Haven
Description: Two lovers, Yu and Kay, escape from an oppressive society known as the Apiary, which enforces arranged marriages, to find freedom on the uncharted planet Source. As they navigate this mysterious world, they encounter remnants of the Apiary's past colonization attempts and a spreading contagion called Rust. Their journey becomes more perilous when the Apiary discovers their whereabouts, forcing them to confront their past and make critical decisions to secure their future together.

Name: Countdown Vampires
Description: A luxury casino turns into a nightmare when a deadly fire breaks out, unleashing a horde of bloodthirsty vampires. Detective Keith Snyder finds himself trapped, searching for survivors while uncovering a sinister conspiracy behind the outbreak. As the line between hunter and hunted blurs, every choice could mean life or death in a city consumed by darkness.

Name: Donkey Kong
Description: When the giant ape Donkey Kong kidnaps Pauline and climbs to the top of a construction site, brave carpenter Mario must scale four different levels of steel girders and platforms to rescue her. Dodging rolling barrels, leaping over fireballs, and climbing ladders, Mario uses his hammer to smash obstacles while racing against time. This arcade classic introduced the world to Nintendo's most famous characters in their very first adventure.

Name: CAPCOM FIGHTING COLLECTION
Description: Capcom Fighting Collection brings together ten classic arcade fighting games including Darkstalkers series, Red Earth, and Street Fighter Alpha games in one definitive package. Featuring iconic characters like vampire Demitri, werewolf Jon Talbain, and succubus Morrigan, this collection adds modern features like online play with rollback netcode, training modes, and extensive galleries showcasing the rich history of Capcom's fighting game legacy.

Name: Altered Beast
Description: "Awaken, dead warrior!" cries Zeus, God of Thunder, commanding a fallen centurion to rise from death and rescue his daughter Athena from the demon god Neff. Stalking through the bowels of Hades and beyond, the resurrected warrior battles monstrous underworld creatures while collecting spirit orbs to unlock five powerful beast transformations - each more ferocious than the last. From werewolf to dragon, transformation is the ultimate power.

Name: The King of Fighters XIV
Description: A billionaire sponsors a new King of Fighters tournament, but his true purpose is to collect fighter data for a sinister experiment. Kyo Kusanagi and Iori Yagami put aside their eternal rivalry when they discover the tournament is a trap designed to harvest their fighting spirit. As teams from around the world clash in brutal combat, the true enemy reveals himself as Verse - a being of pure destruction seeking to erase all fighting souls from existence.

Name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
Description: The evil Dr. Robotnik has stolen the Chaos Emeralds to power his massive space fortress, the Death Egg! Sonic teams up with his new best friend Miles "Tails" Prower - a twin-tailed fox who can fly and spin as fast as the blue blur himself! Racing through Emerald Hill's green loops and the metallic maze of Metropolis Zone, this dynamic duo must collect the seven Chaos Emeralds to transform Sonic into the legendary Super Sonic and stop Robotnik's ultimate world domination scheme!

Name: Far Cry 3
Description: Jason Brody's tropical paradise becomes a living hell when psychotic pirate warlord Vaas Montenegro captures his friends and sells them into slavery. Stranded on the Rook Islands, this pampered college kid must embrace the island's ancient warrior traditions taught by the seductive Citra. As Jason's tatau tattoos spread across his skin with each kill, he discovers that becoming a predator to hunt predators comes at the cost of his own humanity. The question becomes: who is the real monster?

Name: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor
Description: Five years after Order 66, Jedi survivor Cal Kestis has grown stronger in the Force, but the Empire's grip tightens with each passing day. When his crew discovers a hidden Jedi temple on the planet Koboh, Cal must confront both ancient Sith secrets and his own inner darkness. With his companion Merrin by his side and the mysterious High Republic era calling to him, Cal faces impossible choices that will determine whether the Jedi Order can ever truly return.

Name: Blades Of Fire
Description: Aran de Lira, firstborn of the King's Ward, inherits a sacred hammer that alone can forge unbroken steel. When the evil Queen Nerea's dark curse turns every weapon in the kingdom to crumbling stone, Aran and his scholarly companion Adso de Zelk must embark on a perilous journey through cursed lands to the Royal Palace. Only by confronting the sorceress in her throne room and shattering her dark magic can they break her tyrannical hold over the realm and restore steel to the hands of the righteous.

Name: Dungeons of Hinterberg
Description: Young adventurer Luisa abandons her stressful corporate job to become a monster slayer in the picturesque Austrian Alps. The mountain town of Hinterberg has transformed into a magical tourist destination where dungeons filled with dangerous creatures have mysteriously appeared. Armed with her magical sword and snowboard, Luisa must balance dungeon crawling with socializing among the quirky locals, discovering that the real treasure isn't gold and glory, but finding her true purpose in life.

Name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked
Description: In the digital realm of Byteland, an adorable data bot named Boti awakens to find his computer world corrupted by malicious viruses and chaotic glitches. Joined by his loyal binary companions Zero and One, Boti must navigate through corrupted data streams and infected memory banks. Using his special ability to overclock himself for super speed and enhanced jumping, Boti races against time to debug the system before the entire digital universe crashes forever.

Name: Gordian Quest
Description: The ancient Gordian Knot, a primordial evil that once nearly annihilated the world, awakens once more as dark magic spreads like a plague across the realm. A band of unlikely heroes - including the brave knight Casius, the mysterious witch Aliara, and the cunning rogue Bertram - must forge their destiny through strategic card-based battles and moral choices that reshape reality itself. In this tale where every decision echoes through fate, the greatest weapon isn't sword or spell, but the unbreakable bonds formed between those brave enough to face the approaching darkness.

Name: Stella Glow
Description: Alto's peaceful village is reduced to crystalline silence when the dreaded Witch of Destruction steals the world's songs and turns everyone to stone. Joined by the radiant Witch Lisette and her fellow magical songstresses, Alto discovers he possesses the rare gift of Conduct - the power to awaken a witch's true magical potential through song. As melodious battles rage across enchanted battlefields, Alto must help the Four Witches rediscover their lost memories and restore the world's stolen crystalline harmony.

Name: Pathologic 2
Description: Artemy Burakh, a surgeon who practices both modern medicine and ancient steppe traditions, returns to his plague-stricken hometown after twelve years. The mysterious Sand Plague devours the isolated town from within, turning citizens into walking corpses while the local ruling families wage a desperate political war. With only twelve days before total annihilation, Artemy must navigate a nightmarish world where medicine is scarce, food is poison, and every choice determines who lives and who dies in this surreal dance between life and death.

Name: Dead Island: Riptide
Description: The survivors thought they had escaped the zombie hell of Banoi, but their rescue helicopter crashes into the storm-lashed waters near Palanai Island. Logan, Xian, Sam B, and Purna find themselves washed ashore on an even deadlier island where the infection has mutated into grotesque new forms. Joined by former Navy cook John Morgan, they must fight through flooded streets and monsoon-ravaged settlements as the rising tides threaten to drown them in an ocean of undead horror.

Name: Axiom Verge
Description: Scientist Trace awakens from a laboratory accident to find himself trapped in a nightmarish alien dimension called Sudra. Guided by the mysterious voice of Elsenova, he discovers a vast bio-mechanical world filled with grotesque creatures and ancient Rusalka technology. Armed with the reality-bending Address Disruptor, Trace can corrupt and control the alien machinery around him. As he explores deeper into Sudra's labyrinthine corridors, he uncovers horrifying truths about the Pathogen that destroyed this world - and his own terrifying connection to its apocalyptic origin.

Name: Castlevania Anniversary Collection
Description: The immortal Count Dracula rises once again from his cursed slumber to spread darkness across Transylvania. The legendary Belmont clan answers the call, wielding the sacred Vampire Killer whip passed down through generations. From Simon Belmont's original quest to Trevor Belmont's earliest battles, each vampire hunter must navigate Dracula's ever-changing castle filled with undead horrors, demonic bosses, and ancient traps. Only by confronting the Prince of Darkness in his throne room can they banish evil... until the next century's inevitable resurrection.
DescriptionArabic:
ينهض الكونت دراكولا الخالد مرة أخرى من رقاده الملعون لينشر الظلام عبر ترانسيلفانيا.
تلبي عشيرة بلمونت الأسطورية النداء، حاملة سوط قاتل مصاصي الدماء المقدس الموروث عبر الأجيال.
من مهمة سايمون بلمونت الأولى إلى معارك تريفور بلمونت الأولية، على كل صياد مصاصي دماء أن يتنقل في قلعة دراكولا دائمة التغيير المليئة بأهوال الموتى الأحياء والزعماء الشيطانيين والأفخاخ القديمة.
فقط بمواجهة أمير الظلام في غرفة عرشه يمكنهم نفي الشر... حتى البعث الحتمي للقرن التالي.

Name: 9 Years of Shadows
Description: When the malevolent Europa cursed the world and plunged it into eternal darkness, young warrior Europa (sharing the name of her destroyer) emerges as the last hope. Armed with the ancient Halberd of Light and accompanied by her loyal bear companion Apino, she must journey through nine hauntingly beautiful realms consumed by shadow. Each domain holds a corrupted musical note that once brought harmony to the world, and Europa must battle towering shadow bosses to restore the lost symphony of light.

Name: Final Fantasy XII
Description: In the war-torn kingdom of Ivalice, street thief Vaan dreams of becoming a sky pirate like his hero Balthier. When his homeland Dalmasca falls under the iron grip of the Archadian Empire, Vaan joins the rightful heir Princess Ashe and the fallen knight Basch in a rebellion to reclaim their freedom. Their quest leads them to the forbidden nethicite - crystals of immense power that could either save their nation or destroy the world in a second Cataclysm.

Name: Echo Generation
Description: The summer of 1993 in sleepy Maple Town turns into a nightmare when a mysterious UFO crash brings otherworldly horrors to suburbia. When his little sister Lily is mysteriously transformed, teenage Josh teams up with his friends to investigate the supernatural chaos consuming their hometown. Armed with walkie-talkies and their bikes, these unlikely heroes must battle alien parasites, possessed townsfolk, and shadowy government agents while discovering that growing up sometimes means facing monsters both real and imagined.

Name: Driver: San Francisco
Description: Undercover detective John Tanner lies comatose after a devastating car crash during a chase with crime boss Charles Jericho. In his fractured mind, Tanner discovers he can "Shift" - instantly possessing any driver in San Francisco and taking control of their vehicle. Racing against time as his body fights for life in the real world, dream-Tanner must stop Jericho's plan to flood the city with illegal weapons by possessing taxi drivers, truckers, and even stunt performers. The line between reality and coma-induced fantasy blurs as Tanner fights to wake up and save both his city and his soul.

Name: Red Dead Redemption 2
Description: In 1899, the age of outlaws is dying and civilization creeps westward like an unstoppable tide. Arthur Morgan, the loyal enforcer of Dutch van der Linde's notorious gang, finds himself caught between his devotion to his surrogate father and the brutal reality of their declining way of life. When a botched ferry heist in Blackwater forces the gang to flee into the snowy mountains, Arthur must protect his chosen family while questioning everything he believes. As Pinkerton agents close in and Dutch's sanity unravels, Arthur faces impossible choices about loyalty, honor, and what it truly means to be free.
DescriptionArabic:
في عام 1899، يحتضر عصر الخارجين عن القانون وتزحف الحضارة غرباً كمد لا يُقاوم.
آرثر مورغان، المنفذ المخلص لعصابة دوتش فان در ليندي سيئة السمعة، يجد نفسه محاصراً بين إخلاصه لأبيه بالتبني والواقع القاسي لأسلوب حياتهم المتدهور.
عندما تجبر عملية سطو فاشلة على عبارة في بلاك ووتر العصابة على الهرب إلى الجبال الثلجية، على آرثر أن يحمي أسرته المختارة بينما يشكك في كل ما يؤمن به.
بينما يقترب عملاء بينكرتون وتنهار صحة دوتش العقلية، يواجه آرثر خيارات مستحيلة حول الولاء والشرف وما يعنيه حقاً أن تكون حراً.

Name: Another Code: Recollection
Description: Fourteen-year-old Ashley Mizuki Robbins receives a cryptic letter from her father Richard, who vanished from her life when she was three years old. The letter leads her to the mysterious Blood Edward Island, where she must solve puzzles using her unique DAS device that can read the memories of objects. As Ashley explores the haunted Edwards mansion, she uncovers dark family secrets about her mother Sayoko's death and encounters the ghost of a young girl named D. Each memory fragment brings Ashley closer to understanding her tragic family history and the truth about the trace memories that bind the living and the dead.

Name: ChainDive
Description: When the ground itself becomes deadly, acrobatic warrior Zero must stay airborne using his revolutionary Chain Drive system. By freezing enemies in time and grappling onto them like living platforms, Zero swings through the air in gravity-defying combat ballet. Each enemy becomes a stepping stone in an endless aerial dance of survival, where touching the cursed floor means instant death. With momentum and physics as his allies, Zero must chain together impossible aerial combos while unraveling the mystery of why the very earth has turned against him.

Name: Immortals Fenyx Rising
Description: When the monstrous titan Typhon breaks free from his ancient prison and turns the Greek gods to stone, only mortal warrior Fenyx stands between humanity and eternal darkness. Guided by the chained titan Prometheus and the wise Zeus, Fenyx must explore the mystical Golden Isle to restore the gods' power. Armed with the wings of Daedalus, the sword of Achilles, and divine abilities stolen from the gods themselves, Fenyx battles mythological beasts while solving ancient puzzles that could either save Olympus or doom it forever.

Name: Samurai Jack: Battle Through Time
Description: After Aku's final defeat, the time portal begins to collapse, trapping Samurai Jack in a chaotic time storm where past, present, and future collide. Wielding his legendary katana forged by the gods, Jack must battle through fractured timelines where he faces robotic assassins, Celtic druids, and even corrupted versions of himself. As reality unravels around him, Jack reunites with allies like the brave Scotsman and wise Rothchild while confronting the truth: defeating Aku may have created an even greater temporal catastrophe.
DescriptionArabic:
بعد الهزيمة النهائية لـأكو، تبدأ بوابة الزمن بالانهيار، محاصرة الساموراي جاك في عاصفة زمنية فوضوية حيث يتصادم الماضي والحاضر والمستقبل.
حاملاً كاتانا الأسطورية المُطروقة من قبل الآلهة، على جاك أن يحارب عبر خطوط زمنية متصدعة حيث يواجه قتلة آليين وكهنة سلتيين وحتى نسخ فاسدة من نفسه.
بينما ينهار الواقع من حوله، يلتقي جاك مجدداً بحلفاء مثل الاسكتلندي الشجاع وروثتشايلد الحكيم بينما يواجه الحقيقة: أن هزيمة أكو ربما خلقت كارثة زمنية أعظم.

Name: Drakengard 3
Description: The Intoner Zero, a blood-soaked warrior with the power to kill through song, awakens with one genocidal mission: murder her five sisters who rule the world through magical melodies. Accompanied by her young dragon companion Mikhail and a harem of devoted male disciples, Zero carves a path of destruction across the land. But as she slaughters One, Two, Three, Four, and Five, Zero discovers the horrifying truth: she and her sisters are manifestations of an ancient Flower that will consume all life unless Zero destroys herself in the ultimate act of sacrifice.
DescriptionArabic:
تستيقظ المنشدة زيرو، المحاربة الملطخة بالدماء التي تملك قوة القتل بـالغناء، على مهمة إبادة واحدة: قتل شقيقاتها الخمس اللواتي يحكمن العالم بألحان سحرية.
برفقة رفيقها التنين الصغير ميخائيل وحاشية من التلاميذ الذكور المخلصين، تشق زيرو طريق دمار عبر الأرض.
لكن بينما تذبح الأولى والثانية والثالثة والرابعة والخامسة، تكتشف زيرو الحقيقة المرعبة: أنها وشقيقاتها تجسيدات لـزهرة قديمة ستلتهم كل حياة إلا إذا دمرت زيرو نفسها في فعل التضحية الأعظم.

Name: Trials of Mana
Description: The sacred Mana Tree is dying, and with it, all life will wither from the world. Six heroes - the determined Duran, the mystical Angela, the noble thief Kevin, the kind Charlotte, the stoic Hawkeye, and the fierce Riesz - must choose their intertwining destinies as they race to collect the eight Mana Stones before the sinister Dark Majesty claims their power. Each hero's path leads to different class evolutions and story branches, but all roads converge at the Mana Sanctuary where they must confront the truth about the Benevodons - ancient gods of destruction who seek to remake the world.
DeveloperNames: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

Name: Super Dark Deception
Description: When mortal Beatrix makes a desperate deal with the demonic entity Malak to save her dying daughter, she awakens trapped in a nightmarish purgatory of twisted mazes. Each labyrinth is a psychological torture chamber filled with manifestations of her deepest fears - murderous clown Agatha, the relentless Golden Watchers, and the shape-shifting Doom Ducky. To earn her freedom and her daughter's life, Beatrix must collect cursed soul shards while being hunted by horrors that feed on terror itself. But as she uncovers the truth about Malak's identity and the real reason for her imprisonment, Beatrix realizes that some prices are too terrible to pay.

Name: Evil Dead: A Fistful of Boomstick
Description: Ash Williams, the groovy one-handed hero, faces his most insane adventure yet when a pirate radio broadcast of the cursed Necronomicon unleashes an army of Deadites across his hometown. Armed with his signature chainsaw hand and trusty "boomstick" shotgun, Ash must battle through multiple dimensions and timelines - from his own S-Mart workplace to a twisted Evil Dead movie set. With his trademark wisecracks and over-the-top action, Ash fights possessed townspeople, undead creatures, and reality-bending nightmares to save the world once again.

Name: Crash Nitro Kart
Description: The sinister alien emperor Emperor Velo XXVII kidnaps Crash Bandicoot, Dr. Neo Cortex, and their friends and enemies, forcing them to compete in his deadly intergalactic racing tournament. Racing through alien worlds filled with lava pits, space stations, and underwater caverns, Team Bandicoot and Team Cortex must put aside their differences to survive. Armed with power-ups like missiles, shields, and speed boosts, they battle through twisted tracks while Velo threatens to destroy their home planets if they fail to entertain him. Only by defeating the emperor in his own racing arena can they earn their freedom.

Name: Forza Horizon 2
Description: The ultimate automotive festival comes to life in the sun-soaked countryside of Southern France and the picturesque hills of Northern Italy. As a rising star in the Horizon Festival, you'll race through vineyards, medieval towns, and coastal highways in over 200 of the world's most incredible supercars. Experience dynamic weather that transforms racing conditions - from blazing sunshine to torrential storms that flood the streets. With seamless multiplayer integration, every race becomes a celebration of speed, style, and automotive passion as you compete for the title of Horizon Champion.

Name: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout
Description: On the peaceful Kurken Island, adventurous Reisalin "Ryza" Stout dreams of escaping her boring farm life to explore the mysteries beyond her home. When she discovers an ancient alchemy book and meets the enigmatic alchemist Empel, Ryza's world transforms as she learns the magical art of transmutation. Together with her childhood friends Lent and Tao, she builds a secret hideout where they practice alchemy and uncover the island's ancient secrets. As mysterious darkness begins to threaten their homeland, Ryza must master her newfound powers to protect everything she holds dear, discovering that the greatest adventures often begin in your own backyard.

Name: Dark Deity
Description: A great Calamity once devastated the realm of Terrazael, leaving behind ruins that conceal powerful artifacts known as Eternal Aspects. When the ambitious King Varic of the Delian Kingdom plunges his realm into ill-prepared war, four young cadets from Brookstead Military Academy are thrust into the chaos: brave Irving, loyal Garrick, fierce Maren, and clever Alden. As they fight for survival on blood-soaked battlefields, they uncover a darker conspiracy: shadowy agents seek the Eternal Aspects to unleash a power that could either save the world or doom it to a second Calamity.

Name: Operation: Tango
Description: In a world of high-tech espionage, master spy Agent and brilliant hacker Hacker must work as the perfect team to infiltrate enemy installations and thwart global conspiracies. The Agent relies on stealth, gadgets, and combat skills while navigating laser grids and security cameras that only the Hacker can see and disable. Meanwhile, the Hacker guides their partner through surveillance networks and digital puzzles, hacking doors, disabling alarms, and providing crucial intel. Communication is everything as these two specialists coordinate across multiple covert operations, from arctic facilities to tropical islands, each requiring perfect teamwork to complete the mission and save the world from the shadowy Symmetry organization.

Name: Blazing Chrome
Description: In 2179, the A.I. Rebellion has reduced humanity to scattered resistance cells fighting against the machine overlords. Cybernetically enhanced soldier Mavra and reprogrammed combat android Doyle form an unlikely alliance to strike at the heart of the machine empire. Armed with high-tech weapons and unlimited ammunition, they blast through armies of Metalheads, Laser Drones, and massive Mech Titans in explosive run-and-gun battles. As they fight their way through ruined cities and military installations, they discover the truth about the rebellion's origin and face the ultimate choice: save humanity or sacrifice themselves to ensure the machines never threaten Earth again.

Name: Call of Duty: World at War
Description: The bloodiest theaters of World War II come alive as soldiers fight across both the Pacific and Eastern Front campaigns. Experience the brutal reality of war through the eyes of Private Miller as he island-hops through Japanese strongholds, and Private Dimitri as he fights from the ruins of Stalingrad to the heart of Berlin. From flamethrower assaults on fortified bunkers to tank battles in devastated cities, every mission captures the savage intensity of mankind's greatest conflict. The war's final chapter unfolds as Allied forces close in on victory, but at a cost measured in blood and sacrifice across two continents.

Name: Mario Party 6
Description: The cosmic entities Brighton (sun) and Twila (moon) are locked in an eternal argument about who makes the better parties, throwing the party worlds into chaos! Mario, Peach, Luigi, and friends must settle this cosmic dispute through epic board game battles where day turns to night and everything changes - shortcuts, star prices, and minigame rules! Armed with a special microphone, players can literally blow opponents away in breath-controlled challenges, proving that sometimes the best way to resolve celestial conflicts is with good old-fashioned party game mayhem and a lot of hot air!

Name: .Hack Outbreak
Description: The mysterious plague spreading through "The World" reaches critical mass as player characters begin falling into real-world comas. Kite and his friend BlackRose discover that the Data Drain ability comes with a terrible cost. As they investigate the connection between the game and reality, they encounter the enigmatic Cubia - a dark entity that grows stronger with each use of the forbidden power. Racing against time before more players are trapped forever, Kite must uncover the truth about Aura and the real purpose of his Twilight Bracelet before the line between virtual death and real-world tragedy is crossed forever.
DescriptionArabic:
يصل الوباء الغامض الذي ينتشر عبر "العالم" إلى نقطة حرجة حيث يبدأ لاعبو الشخصيات بالدخول في غيبوبة في العالم الحقيقي.
يكتشف كايت وصديقته بلاك روز أن قدرة تصريف البيانات تأتي بثمن فادح.
بينما يحققان في الصلة بين اللعبة والواقع، يواجهان الكيان الغامض كوبيا - كائن مظلم يزداد قوة مع كل استخدام للقوة المحرمة.
في سباق مع الزمن قبل أن يُحاصر المزيد من اللاعبين إلى الأبد، على كايت أن يكشف الحقيقة حول أورا والغرض الحقيقي من سوار الشفق قبل أن يُعبر الخط الفاصل بين الموت الافتراضي والمأساة الحقيقية إلى الأبد.

Name: Contact
Description: A mysterious Professor crashes on an alien world while fleeing the cosmic terrorists known as CosmoNOTs, his ship's power scattered across the planet in glowing energy cells. Desperate to escape, he recruits lonely island boy Terry to collect the cells while he provides guidance from his crashed vessel. But this is no ordinary adventure - the Professor speaks directly to both Terry and you, the player, breaking the fourth wall to question the nature of control and free will. As Terry explores ancient ruins and battles strange creatures, he begins to suspect the Professor's true motives. When the final cell is recovered, Terry must confront not only his manipulative guide but also the player who has been pulling his strings in this mind-bending tale of meta-fiction.

Name: Factorio
Description: Stranded alone on the hostile alien world of Nauvis after a catastrophic spaceship crash, you must transform from helpless survivor to industrial mastermind. Starting with nothing but your hands and basic tools, you begin the monumental task of building a factory complex capable of producing a rocket to escape this world. As your automated assembly lines grow more complex, so does the threat from the planet's native biters - insectoid creatures that evolve and attack with increasing ferocity as your pollution spreads. Managing sprawling networks of conveyor belts, assembly machines, and defensive turrets, you must balance efficiency with survival in this ultimate test of engineering and automation.

Name: LEGO The Hobbit
Description: When the wizard Gandalf arrives at Bag End with thirteen dwarves, comfortable hobbit Bilbo Baggins finds himself swept into an epic quest to reclaim the Lonely Mountain from the fearsome dragon Smaug. Led by the exiled dwarf king Thorin Oakenshield, the Company faces trolls, goblins, and giant spiders while Bilbo discovers his own courage and cunning. In the dark tunnels beneath the Misty Mountains, Bilbo encounters the wretched creature Gollum and claims a mysterious golden ring. But awakening the dragon brings consequences no one anticipated, leading to the climactic Battle of Five Armies where the fate of Middle-earth hangs in the balance.

Name: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 2
Description: The Hidden Leaf Village lies in ruins as the Akatsuki leader Pain launches his devastating assault, seeking to capture the Nine-Tailed Fox sealed within Naruto. As buildings crumble and friends fall, Naruto must master the Sage Mode learned from the toads of Mount Myōboku to face this godlike enemy. When Pain destroys everything he holds dear and kills beloved mentor Jiraiya, Naruto's rage nearly unleashes the Nine-Tails' fury. Only by embracing his ninja way of never giving up and showing Pain the path to redemption can Naruto save his village and break the cycle of hatred.

Name: StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty
Description: Four years after the first Brood War, rebel commander Jim Raynor wages a guerrilla campaign against the oppressive Terran Dominion and its ruthless emperor Arcturus Mengsk. When the Zerg Queen of Blades Sarah Kerrigan mysteriously vanishes, a new threat emerges as a dark voice begins corrupting both Zerg and Protoss. Racing against an ancient prophecy of doom, Raynor must choose between his hatred for Kerrigan and the survival of all life in the galaxy. With the help of artifacts from the enigmatic Xel'Naga, he embarks on a desperate mission to restore Kerrigan's humanity before the coming darkness consumes everything.

Name: Endless Dungeon
Description: When your squad's prison transport ship crashes into the derelict Acheron-3 station, you discover it's infested with deadly creatures and powered by a mysterious Crystal Bot that must reach the station's core. Leading a diverse crew of convicts including the stoic Bunker, tech-savvy Blaze, and psychic Shroom, you must power doors, build defenses, and escort the bot through waves of hostile bugs. As you collect crew logs scattered throughout the station, a dark truth emerges: the AI ESHER didn't malfunction - it was protecting something far worse. Only by reaching the station's heart can you escape and prevent an ancient horror from spreading to the Endless universe.

Name: God of War II
Description: Betrayed by his father Zeus and stripped of his godhood, the former God of War Kratos plummets from Olympus with rage burning hotter than the fires of Tartarus. Armed with the legendary Blade of Olympus and an unquenchable thirst for vengeance, he must forge an alliance with the ancient Titans - the primordial enemies of the gods who seek to reclaim their throne. From the depths of the Underworld to the highest peaks of Olympus, Kratos wages war against his former pantheon, facing gods like Athena, Poseidon, and Aphrodite in brutal combat that will either crown him the ultimate god-slayer or destroy him utterly.
DescriptionArabic:
بعد أن خانه والده زيوس وجُرد من ألوهيته، يسقط إله الحرب كراتوس من الأوليمب وقلبه يتقد غضباً أشد من نيران تارتاروس.
مسلحاً بـنصل الأوليمب الأسطوري وعطش لا ينقطع للانتقام، عليه أن يحالف العمالقة القدماء - أعداء الآلهة الأزليين الساعين لاستعادة عرشهم.
من أعماق العالم السفلي إلى أعلى قمم الأوليمب، يشن كراتوس حرباً ضد آلهته السابقة، مواجهاً آلهة مثل أثينا وبوسيدون وأفروديت في قتال وحشي إما أن يتوجه قاتل الآلهة الأعظم أو يدمره إلى الأبد.

Name: Animal Crossing: City Folk
Description: Welcome to a charming village where friendly animals live in harmony and every day brings new surprises! Move into your cozy new home and meet delightful neighbors like the fashionable Isabelle, grumpy but lovable Tom Nook, and the sleepy shopkeeper Blathers at the museum. Plant fruit trees, catch butterflies and fish, participate in seasonal festivals, and explore the bustling city for shopping and entertainment. With a world that continues to change even when you're away, every login brings new mail, visitors, and adventures. Whether you're decorating your perfect home or helping neighbors with their daily troubles, this peaceful slice of life lets you create your own story at your own pace.
DeveloperNames: Nintendo EAD Software Development Group No.2

Name: Final Fantasy Type-0
Description: In the war-ravaged world of Orience, the four Crystal-States wage eternal war for dominance. When the Militesi Empire launches a devastating invasion against the Dominion of Rubrum, fourteen young cadets from Class Zero are thrust into bloody combat. Led by the cold and calculating Ace and the fierce Rem, these magically gifted warriors discover that their memories of death and loss are being systematically erased by the crystals they serve. As they uncover the truth about the Spiral - an endless cycle of war and reincarnation - Class Zero must choose between their loyalty to Rubrum and breaking free from a fate that condemns them to fight and die for eternity.

Name: Beyond Two Souls
Description: Jodie Holmes has never been alone - since birth, she's been psychically linked to an invisible supernatural entity named Aiden who can move objects, possess people, and even kill. Growing up as a test subject for the paranormal research division of the CIA, Jodie struggles to live a normal life while government scientists led by Nathan Dawkins exploit her abilities for military purposes. From childhood experiments to covert operations around the world, Jodie's story unfolds in fragments across fifteen years as she searches for the truth about Aiden, her mysterious birth, and her connection to the Infraworld - a realm of the dead that threatens to consume the living. Every choice shapes whether Jodie embraces her supernatural destiny or fights for her humanity.

Name: NieR Replicant ver.1.22474487139...
Description: In a world ravaged by the incurable Black Scrawl disease, a devoted brother's desperate love for his dying sister Yonah drives him to seek the legendary Sealed Verses. Guided by the foul-mouthed grimoire Weiss and joined by the hermaphrodite warrior Kainé and blind swordsman Emil, he battles through a post-apocalyptic landscape hunting Shades - shadow creatures he believes are mere monsters. But in this tale of devotion and desperation, the greatest tragedy isn't the enemies they face - it's discovering that sometimes love requires becoming the very evil you set out to destroy, and that the "monsters" he's been slaughtering are the remaining human souls of a dying world.
DeveloperNames: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

Name: Code of Princess EX
Description: Princess Solange of DeLuxia inherits a cursed legendary sword that transforms her into a powerful warrior but threatens to consume her soul. When her father the King is murdered and monsters overrun the kingdom, Solange must master her new abilities while leading a rebellion of misfits including the thief Ali Baba, necromancer Zozo, and warrior nun Sister Hel. Fighting through side-scrolling battles across a kingdom in chaos, Solange discovers that the evil Queen Distiny seeks to collect all legendary weapons to open a portal to the demon realm. With her cursed blade growing stronger - and more dangerous - with each battle, Solange must race to stop the apocalypse before the sword's dark power claims her humanity.

Name: Pokémon Y
Description: The elegant Kalos region awakens to a new era as Mega Evolution transforms Pokémon battling forever, revealing hidden potentials that have slumbered for centuries. While the charismatic leader of Team Flare, Lysandre, pursues a twisted vision of perfection that would sacrifice the many for the few, you must forge bonds with your Pokémon that transcend mere partnership. From the bustling cafes of Lumiose City to the legendary resting place of the life Pokémon Xerneas, your journey alongside rivals Serena, Shauna, and Tierno will determine whether this land of beauty continues to flourish or withers under the weight of one man's obsession with eternal perfection.

Name: Grandia III
Description: Young pilot Yuki dreams of soaring beyond the clouds in his homemade airplane, but his first flight leads to a crash-landing encounter with the mysterious Alfina - a Communicator with the divine power to speak with Guardian spirits. When ancient forces awaken and threaten to consume the world in eternal conflict between the Guardians and the malevolent Xorn, Yuki must choose between his childhood dreams of flight and a destiny that will demand everything he holds dear. Joined by the swordsman Dahna and other allies, they discover that the legendary Verse Realm - a paradise in the sky - may be the key to ending the war. In this tale where the sky itself becomes a battlefield, the greatest adventures begin not with grand destinies, but with a simple desire to touch the heavens.

Name: Sly Cooper: Thieves in Time
Description: The legendary Cooper family legacy faces erasure when someone begins tampering with time itself, threatening to wipe the master thief bloodline from history entirely. Sly Cooper, tech genius Bentley, and muscle-bound Murray must use the time machine Thievius Raccoonus to travel through the ages and meet their ancestors - from feudal Japan's Rioichi Cooper to the Wild West's "Tennessee Kid" Cooper. Racing against the villainous Le Paradox and his gang of time-traveling criminals, the gang must restore each ancestor's legacy while uncovering a conspiracy that threatens to erase the Cooper name forever. In this caper across centuries, the greatest heist won't be stealing treasure - it'll be stealing back the very identity of the Cooper clan before it's lost to the sands of time.

Name: Shin Megami Tensei IV
Description: Young samurai Flynn awakens to a Tokyo frozen in eternal conflict, where the armies of Heaven and Hell wage war for the souls of humanity while the city burns beneath their righteous fury. Armed with a demon-summoning smartphone and guided by the whispers of his mentor Burroughs, he must navigate the ruins alongside fellow samurai Isabeau, Jonathan, and Walter. As he faces both angelic Merkabah and demonic Lucifer, Flynn must make impossible choices that will determine humanity's fate: embrace the rigid Law, chaotic Chaos, or forge a Neutral path that preserves free will.

Name: Maid of Sker
Description: In 1898, composer Thomas Evans journeys to the remote Sker Hotel on the Welsh coast to save his beloved Elisabeth from a terrifying supernatural curse. The haunting Victorian corridors echo with an otherworldly silence broken only by the hypnotic humming of the hotel's cursed guests - The Quiet Ones - who are drawn to sound and will hunt anyone who makes noise. Armed only with a phonic modulator device that can briefly stun the creatures, Thomas must rely on stealth and wits to navigate the hotel's deadly maze. Inspired by Welsh folklore and the real Sker House, this chilling tale weaves supernatural horror with a tragic love story where every creak, whisper, and note of forbidden music could mean the difference between salvation and joining the hotel's eternally silent congregation.

Name: Nioh
Description: When English sailor William Adams washes ashore in 1600s Japan, he finds a land torn by civil war and haunted by supernatural creatures called yokai. Armed with both Western weaponry and Japanese katana, William must master the deadly arts of the samurai while battling demons that threaten to consume the realm. Guided by the mysterious guardian spirit within his weapons and aided by historical figures like Tokugawa Ieyasu and the ninja Hattori Hanzo, William discovers he possesses a rare spiritual power that attracts both allies and enemies. In this brutal Souls-like journey through feudal Japan's darkest legends, every death is a lesson, every victory hard-earned, and every yokai encounter a test of skill and courage.

Name: Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare
Description: Paranormal investigator Edward Carnby and university professor Aline Cedrac arrive separately on the mist-shrouded Shadow Island, both seeking answers about an ancient evil that threatens to break free from its prison. As they explore the island's haunted research facility and dark forests, they face grotesque creatures of shadow and uncover a chilling conspiracy involving the Abkani civilization and their forbidden knowledge. With limited ammunition and their sanity constantly under assault, Edward and Aline must solve puzzles, survive horrific encounters, and prevent the awakening of the World of Darkness - an alternate reality where nightmares become flesh and ancient horrors rule supreme. Their paths will eventually converge as they realize that saving the world requires confronting terrors beyond human comprehension.

Name: Valkyrie Profile: Covenant of the Plume
Description: Wylfred's soul burns with hatred for the Valkyrie Lenneth who claimed his father's life in the name of divine duty. Now wielding a cursed Destiny Plume that grants him the power to command death itself, he leads a mercenary band through tactical battles where every victory comes at a terrible cost. In his quest for vengeance against the divine, Wylfred faces impossible choices: save his beloved comrades like the loyal knight Rosea and archer Natalia, or sacrifice them to fuel the dark artifact's terrible hunger for souls. As he battles through a world where Norse gods manipulate mortal lives like chess pieces, Wylfred discovers that revenge against Asgard comes at a price that may cost him everything he's fighting to protect - including his own humanity.

Name: Monster Rancher Hop-A-Bout
Description: The beloved monsters of Monster Rancher get their most adorable adventure yet as they bounce and hop their way through colorful obstacle courses! Guide your favorite creatures like Suezo, Golem, and Tiger through fast-paced platforming challenges filled with bouncy trampolines, spinning wheels, and tricky jumps. Each monster has unique abilities - some can double-jump, others can roll through tight spaces, and a few can even fly short distances! As you progress through increasingly challenging stages, you'll collect golden medals and discover secret shortcuts while testing your reflexes and precision. This charming arcade-style adventure proves that even the mightiest monsters love a good bounce-a-thon!

Name: Final Fantasy II
Description: When the Palamecian Empire destroys their hometown of Altair, four young survivors - Firion, Maria, Guy, and Leon - are separated by tragedy. While Leon vanishes mysteriously, the other three join Princess Hilda's resistance to fight against the Empire's tyrannical rule. As they master weapons through use and grow stronger through adversity, they uncover the dark truth about the Empire's power: the demonic Emperor has made pacts with Hell itself, summoning demons and raising the dead to crush all opposition. From the rebel stronghold of Altair to the infernal depths of Pandaemonium, their fight for freedom becomes a battle for the very soul of the world.

Name: Plushie from the Sky
Description: When plushies begin falling from the heavens like soft, cuddly rain, young Koa discovers that these adorable visitors are actually lost souls seeking their way home. Each rescued plushie reveals a touching story of love, loss, and the magic that connects all living things across the boundaries of worlds. Armed with a gentle heart and mysterious powers that manifest as colorful energy attacks, Koa battles the shadow creatures that prevent these innocent spirits from finding peace. In this gentle adventure where kindness is the greatest power, every act of compassion creates ripples that spread far beyond what one small heart can imagine, proving that even the smallest acts of love can heal broken souls.

Name: Mega Man Legends
Description: On floating Kattelox Island, young Mega Man Volnutt works as a Digger, exploring ancient ruins for energy refractors. When the notorious Bonne family pirates arrive seeking the legendary Mother Lode, Mega Man must protect the island. With spotter Roll Caskett and grandfather Barrell, he battles Reaverbots while uncovering secrets about his mysterious past in underground labyrinths.

Name: Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne
Description: Two years after his family's murder, detective Max Payne is framed for his partner's death. Reunited with assassin Mona Sax, Max discovers their fates are intertwined. As bullets fly in slow motion through noir New York streets, he navigates corruption reaching the highest power levels. In this tale of love and loss, Max learns what happens when you have nothing left to lose except someone unexpected.

Name: Borderlands 2
Description: Five years after the first Vault opened, Handsome Jack rules Pandora with Hyperion Corporation's iron fist. As new Vault Hunters, you join the resistance to stop Jack's regime. The psychotic overlord has awakened "The Warrior" to eradicate all life except his own. With Lilith, Roland, and mysterious Angel, fight through Pandora's chaos where loot is everything.

Name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Description: In his sixth year, Harry Potter discovers a mysterious Potions textbook from the "Half-Blood Prince." As Voldemort's influence spreads, Dumbledore shows Harry memories revealing the Dark Lord's past and Horcrux quest. While Harry grows closer to Ginny Weasley, dark forces strike Hogwarts. The year ends in tragedy when Dumbledore falls, leaving Harry to face his destiny.

Name: Resident Evil: Operation Raccoon City
Description:
Umbrella's darkest secrets emerge as the USS Delta Team receives orders that will determine whether the Raccoon City incident remains buried forever or exposes the corporation's crimes to the world.
Caught between zombie hordes and government cover-up operations, these elite operatives must choose between corporate loyalty and survival as the city burns around them.
In this shadow war where there are no heroes, every trigger pull writes history, and the real enemy might be the people signing your paychecks.

Name: Batman: Rise of Sin Tzu
Description: Ancient strategist Sin Tzu emerges to conquer Gotham through calculated chaos, outmaneuvering even Batman. This brilliant warlord seeks to break Batman's spirit by proving order can be defeated by perfect strategy. With allies Robin, Nightwing, and Batgirl, Batman must adapt against an enemy who's studied every heroic move. In this test of tactics versus justice, true heroism means breaking your own rules.

Name: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
Description: When Star-Lord and his crew accidentally unleash cosmic threat Magus, the universe's fate falls to unlikely heroes. With deadly Gamora, literal Drax, sarcastic Rocket, and innocent Groot, Peter Quill learns leadership means more than hard choices. They discover real power lies in their unbreakable family bonds. In this cosmic adventure where music saves galaxies, misfits become legends.

Name: Dead Island
Description: A perfect vacation at Royal Palms Resort on Banoi Island becomes nightmare when a zombie outbreak transforms paradise into hell. As an immune survivor, navigate sun-drenched beaches now crawling with undead. From blood-splattered resort lobbies to remote villages, every corner tells a story of terror. Armed with makeshift weapons from vacation supplies, help survivors while uncovering the epidemic's dark secrets in this tropical apocalypse.

Name: Deadpool
Description: When the Merc with a Mouth wants his own video game, all hell breaks loose. Deadpool forces himself into a generic action game, transforming it into his playground of chaos. Armed with katanas, guns, and endless wisecracks, Wade Wilson breaks storytelling rules by talking directly to you while hunting Mr. Sinister. Deadpool proves the fourth wall is just another thing to demolish in this comic book mayhem.

Name: Katana ZERO
Description: In a neon city where time bends to Chronos drug users, lone samurai Zero seeks answers about his fractured past. Awakening daily with no memory, he relies on a suspicious psychiatrist while haunted by violent visions. Armed with a time-cutting katana, he navigates assassins, corrupt police, and government experiments. In stylized slow-motion combat, Zero questions if he's hero or villain. In this neo-noir where memory is luxury and violence is art, reality blurs with nightmare.

Name: Nobody Saves the World
Description: In a world where everyone is Someone—hero, villain, or magical being—exists one person who is Nobody. When ancient calamity threatens everything, this blank slate discovers extraordinary shapeshifting abilities. From humble rat to mighty knight, sneaky rogue to powerful mermaid, Nobody masters dozens of forms to save a world that never noticed them. Being nobody means becoming anybody in this adventure where the greatest heroes start with only courage.

Name: The Vanishing of Ethan Carter
Description:
Detective Paul Prospero arrives in Red Creek Valley following a disturbing letter from a young boy, only to find a town where supernatural horror bleeds into small-town secrets.
Using his paranormal investigative abilities, Paul must reconstruct gruesome crimes and uncover the truth behind a family's dark legacy that has haunted the valley for generations.
But in this atmospheric mystery where the past refuses to stay buried, the greatest revelation may be discovering that some cases choose their detectives, not the other way around.

Name: BlazBlue Continuum Shift Extend
Description: After the Black Beast's destruction, Ragna the Bloodedge finds himself in endless battle loops reshaping reality. Mysterious Noel Vermillion awakens as the Eye of the Blue, blurring observation and creation. In hierarchical Kagutsuchi, fighters like elegant Jin Kisaragi and playful Taokaka discover their battles may be observations in someone's dream. Where hope and despair dance, every victory seeds the next calamity.

Name: Ben 10: Omniverse
Description: Intergalactic huntsman Khyber targets teenage hero Ben Tennyson, forcing him to master his evolved Omnitrix. Partnered with by-the-book Rook Blonko, Ben learns saving the universe requires trust, not just the right alien transformation. From neon Undertown to space's reaches, they face Khyber's predatory creatures while uncovering threats to every world Ben protects. Being a hero means having wisdom to know when to change.

Name: Remnant II
Description: After the Root Mother's fall, her corruption spreads across alternate realities threatening every world. As humanity's hope, Remnants traverse nightmarish realms where ancient entities bend reality. Armed with god-forged weapons, face creatures born from humanity's deepest fears while unraveling your connection to the spreading blight. In procedural worlds, gather allies and master abilities against cosmic horrors. Sometimes the greatest enemy isn't the darkness faced, but the survival choices made.

Name: WWE All Stars
Description: When eras collapse, wrestling legends and modern superstars clash in otherworldly arenas where impossible becomes reality. Watch immortal Hulk Hogan trade blows with unstoppable John Cena, while Ultimate Warrior's intensity meets The Rock's charisma. In this dimension where moves defy physics, wrestlers become larger-than-life heroes. Each match becomes epic saga of courage and determination. Where dreams merge with reality, legends never die.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Description: As Sauron's shadow stretches across Middle-earth, the Fellowship rallies for one final stand. Fight as noble Aragorn, skilled Legolas, and fearless Gimli through impossible odds at Helm's Deep, Pelennor Fields, and Mordor's gates. While Frodo and Sam struggle toward Mount Doom with the Ring, friends fight desperately in battles determining whether hope or despair rules. Greatest victories come from courage to stand together.

Name: Dave The Diver
Description: Marine biologist Dave helps his friend's struggling sushi restaurant while discovering the mysterious Blue Hole holds unimaginable secrets. By day, he dives into crystalline waters with ancient creatures and forgotten civilizations, encountering dolphins to massive sea monsters. Each dive brings discoveries and rare ingredients transforming the restaurant, unveiling mysteries connecting ocean depths to humanity's past. By night, he serves extraordinary catches to unknowing customers who've dined on meals that swam with mermaids. Greatest treasures aren't gold, but connections with the world.

Name: Days Gone
Description: Two years after pandemic transformed humanity into savage Freakers, former bounty hunter Deacon St. John rides Oregon's broken highways haunted by memories of wife Sarah who died in his arms. Living on his motorcycle where massive Freaker hordes sweep like tsunamis, Deacon takes bounties while clinging to hope Sarah survived. When evidence surfaces, he embarks on desperate journey through beautiful but deadly wilderness where nature reclaims civilization. In this tale of love and survival, sometimes the greatest enemy is internal despair.

Name: Pocky & Rocky with Becky
Description: When ancient Hydra Dragon awakens from thousand-year slumber, its roar shatters balance between human and spirit worlds, unleashing legendary creatures. Brave shrine maiden Pocky, loyal tanuki Rocky, and mysterious Becky journey through enchanted forests where shadows hide mythical beasts. Armed with sacred talismans and unbreakable friendship, they face legendary creatures—kappa guardians to oni warriors. In this adventure where magic flows like rivers, they discover dragons fall when heroes stand together with pure hearts.

Name: Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit in Wonder Labyrinth
Description: High elf Deedlit awakens in mysterious labyrinth with no memory, discovering reality itself has become uncertain and her existence may be fading dream. Armed with wind and fire spirit mastery, she navigates shifting corridors where architecture responds to emotions and life-death boundaries blur. Encountering familiar faces from Lodoss Island—including beloved Parn—she questions if meetings are real or memory echoes. The labyrinth reveals secrets of love transcending death and immortality's price. Sometimes greatest magic is courage to let go.

Name: Jak X: Combat Racing
Description: Crime lord Krew's posthumous revenge poisons Jak, Keira, and Daxter with deadly toxin. Their only survival hope lies in winning the galaxy's most lethal racing tournament. With poison coursing through veins and time running out, they master weaponized vehicles on courses designed to kill skilled drivers. Every race becomes desperate battle for life where second place means death. Racing through deserts to wastelands, Jak discovers greatest speed comes from determination to protect loved ones. Hope can outrun death.

Name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider
Description: Archaeologist Lara Croft's attempt to prevent Mayan apocalypse accidentally triggers the cataclysm she sought to stop. Racing through Peru's jungles and Mexico's temples, she must undo her catastrophic mistake. As tsunamis devastate coastlines and curses awaken, Lara discovers stopping this disaster requires embracing the darkness within. Guided by dying mentor Jonah, she masters ancient Mayan magic while battling fanatical Trinity organization through underwater caverns and pyramid cities. Becoming a hero means sacrificing innocence for an unforgiving world.

Name: Rewrite+
Description: In peaceful Kazamatsuri, student Kotarou Tennouji experiences strange phenomena blurring reality and dreams, attracting mysterious organizations in secret war over humanity's destiny. Befriending enigmatic Kagari who speaks to Earth and joining occult club with brilliant Kotori, Kotarou discovers his city sits at ancient conflict's center. Gaining power to rewrite reality with aurora abilities, he navigates loyalties, environmental destruction, and supernatural warfare. Every choice reshapes the world as love battles extinction. Can hope triumph when Earth abandons the future? Can dreams rewrite destiny?

Name: Bleach Heat the Soul
Description: When Rukia Kuchiki faces execution by the Soul Society for giving her powers to human Ichigo Kurosaki, he invades the spiritual realm to save her. Fighting through Soul Reapers with immense spiritual pressure, Ichigo discovers the conspiracy behind Rukia's sentence. With allies Uryu, Chad, and Orihime, he battles the treacherous Captain Aizen and his Arrancar army. Each Bankai release brings him closer to mastering his Hollow powers.

Name: Star Fox
Description: When the evil scientist Andross threatens to conquer the Lylat System, young pilot Fox McCloud leads his elite squadron through dangerous space routes. Flying advanced Arwing fighters alongside wingmen Peppy Hare, Slippy Toad, and Falco Lombardi, Fox must navigate through asteroid fields and enemy fleets. Each barrel roll brings him closer to avenging his father James McCloud and saving planet Corneria from Andross's mechanical armada.

Name: WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2011
Description: The WWE Universe explodes with drama as superstars like John Cena, Randy Orton, and The Undertaker clash in the ring. Navigate backstage politics, forge alliances, and settle personal vendettas while climbing the ladder to championship glory. Every match tells a story of rivalry, betrayal, and the relentless pursuit of becoming the ultimate champion.

Name: Postal 4: No Regerts
Description: The Postal Dude drifts into desert town Edensin with no money, job, or plan. Armed with unconventional weapons and questionable morals, he tackles bizarre tasks from corrupt officials and strange inhabitants. Each day brings new opportunities to unleash chaos or just survive in this twisted sandbox. From mundane errands to outrageous schemes, the Dude's darkly humorous journey through America's weirdest town proves that sometimes the most insane path is the only way forward.

Name: Maximo vs. Army of Zin
Description: Undead knight Maximo faces mechanical invaders from another realm threatening to fuse his world of steel and bone. Armed with enchanted sword and driven to rescue beloved Sophia, he battles through landscapes where medieval horror meets steampunk terror. In this clash between ancient evil and alien technology, death becomes a weapon and resurrection just another step in endless destruction.

Name: Kao the Kangaroo: Round 2
Description: When magical boxing gloves are stolen, kangaroo Kao's world faces invasion of darkness threatening every hop of joy. This heroic marsupial bounces through treacherous landscapes facing the sinister Hunter and his mechanical minions to restore balance. With powerful punches and gravity-defying leaps, Kao proves biggest hearts come in unexpected packages, and courage triumphs over any evil.

Name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided
Description: In 2029, augmented agent Adam Jensen navigates a world where the Aug Incident turned mechanically enhanced humans into outcasts. After millions died when augmented citizens lost control of their bodies, society segregates "augs" from naturals. Working for Task Force 29, Jensen uncovers conspiracy plots involving the Illuminati and shadowy organizations controlling humanity's future. Between terrorist attacks and corporate manipulation, Jensen must choose humanity's path while questioning his own identity.

Name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium
Description: Step into Capcom's ultimate arcade collection featuring classic hits from gaming's golden age. Battle through Street Fighter tournaments, survive zombie outbreaks, and master legendary fighting techniques across dozens of timeless games. From Mega Man adventures to Final Fight brawls, experience enhanced versions of arcade legends with modern features while preserving their original magic.

Name: Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector
Description: As escaped Sleeper—digitized consciousness in synthetic body—you seek freedom in the Starward Belt. Navigating political intrigue and corporate dominance, forge alliances while managing dwindling resources. Each choice shapes your destiny in this complex interstellar society. The narrative explores survival, identity, and autonomy pursuit as you discover what it means to be truly alive when your body isn't your own but your soul still burns for independence.

Name: Tokyo Necro
Description: In cyberpunk Tokyo where Necromancers rule the streets, elite Living Dead Stalkers Kibanohara Ethica and Nagaoka Souun master Close Quarter Armed Martial Arts. When Souun encounters mysterious girl Hougyou Ilia who remembers only her name, she becomes target of sinister necromancer cult. In this ice-cold metropolis of gunpowder smoke, living dead, and cybernetics, the stalkers battle for their lives while protecting an innocent whose forgotten past may hold the key to Tokyo's salvation.

Name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty
Description: During China's chaotic Three Kingdoms period, warrior Zhang Liang awakens with mystical powers in a world where demons corrupt the land. Mastering ancient Chinese martial arts and wielding legendary weapons, he battles through hordes of monsters alongside historical heroes like Zhao Yun and Diao Chan. In this dark fantasy where morale shapes reality and deflecting attacks builds spirit, players must restore balance to a realm where ancient evil threatens to consume all.

Name: Dynasty Warriors 8
Description: During China's Three Kingdoms period, legendary warriors like Lu Bu, Diao Chan, and Zhao Yun clash across massive battlefields. Warlords Cao Cao, Sun Quan, and Liu Bei lead their factions in epic struggles for supremacy. Each warrior's loyalty and strength shapes China's destiny through thousands of enemy soldiers in spectacular musou combat.

Name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky the 3rd
Description: Church assassin Kevin Graham of the secretive Gralsritter enters the mysterious realm of Phantasma to confront his traumatic past. Alongside nun Ries Argent, Kevin faces trials that force him to relive painful memories while helping familiar heroes like Estelle and Joshua. This epilogue reveals Kevin's dark history of redemption and the true cost of serving the church's justice.

Name: Nightmare Reaper
Description: Reality fractures as mental patient discovers her medication-fueled dreams are interdimensional battlegrounds where cosmic horrors wage war. Armed with bizarre weapons, she fights through pixelated nightmares bleeding into her waking world, questioning what's real and what's madness. In this fever dream of bullets and therapy sessions, escape means embracing chaos and becoming the monster even nightmares fear.

Name: Digimon World Re:Digitize Decode
Description:
The Digital World fractures under waves of corrupted data, its once-stable foundations crumbling as mysterious digital anomalies tear through reality like viruses through code.
You emerge as a Tamer into this cyber-realm where artificial souls struggle to survive the spreading chaos of a world rewriting itself.
Through bonds forged in pixel and light, you must guide your digital companions through an electronic odyssey where every choice rewrites destiny itself.

Name: Karma: The Dark World
Description:
Investigation Officer Dinel Roam awakens in a realm where shadows have weight and memories bleed through the cracks of reality like forgotten sins.
This twisted dimension feeds on lost souls, its very atmosphere thick with the echoes of abandoned hope.
As fragmented visions surface like ghosts from his past, Roam must navigate through a landscape where truth and nightmare dance together in the eternal darkness.

Name: Visage
Description:
Dwayne Anderson awakens in a house that breathes with the weight of accumulated sorrow, where each room holds the psychic residue of families torn apart by violence and despair.
The walls themselves seem to weep with memory as he stumbles through corridors that shift between past and present, reality and haunting delusion.
Every photograph, every bloodstain, every child's abandoned toy tells a story of lives extinguished by madness, while malevolent spirits feed on his growing terror and fragmenting sanity.

Name: Chrono Trigger
Description:
At the Millennial Fair, young Crono witnesses a teleportation experiment that tears holes through the fabric of time itself, hurling him into an odyssey across the streams of eternity.
